BUloVkavelAlx iMtu parxLayajaladalilx muLugihoVgiruvalilx sapatxsUyaRriMda dagadhxvAda sakala jiVvabiVjagaLU janaloVkakekx horaTu hoVguvuvu, Aga rudarxteVjasisxniMda dAvxdashAditayxrU nAshahoMduvaru, Aga parxpaMcavelAlx jalamayavAdAga paramAtamxnu vAyuvanunx tananx deVhadoLage seVrisikoMDu oMdu sAvira yugagaLavarivigU samudarxdalelxV malagibiDuvanu, A kAladalilx barxhamxnu saha A oMdu sAvira yuga kaLeyuvavarege tAnU saha parxLayajaladalilx malagidudx, A kAlavu mugidoDane meVlakekxdudx, punaH parxpaMcavanunx saqSiTxsuvanu, parxtiyoMdu kalapx (parxLaya) da koneyalilxyU ideV riVti naDeyutitxruvudu

pAshupatayoVgada vivaraNe; adariMda shiva pUjAkarxma; aSATxMga yoVgasAdhana karxma; yama, niyama, Asana, shwca, pArxNAyAma BeVda PalagaLu, dhAyxna, dhAraNA, mUlAdhArAdi cakarxvivaraNe; samAdhisavxrUpa vivaraNe.
yoVgaviGanxgaLu, avugaLa nivAraNe, yoVga sididhxgaLu, aSeTxYshavxrayxgaLa lABa, paqthivAyxdi tatavxgaLalilxruva guNagaLu; yoVganiSAThxmahime apAravAdudu.
maheVshavxrana anugarxhakekx yoVgayxrAgiruvavara savxrUpa, sharxdedhxyeV muKayx sAdhana, liMgAcaRneyu sulaBoVpAya, dharAmxcaraNe, adharamxtAyxga, BakitxBAva savxrUpasAdhanagaLu.

viSuNxvu liMgarUpiyAgi AviBaRvisida shivananunx sutxtisidudu; A sotxVtarx paThana Palashurxti.
I sotxVtarxdiMda saMtuSaTxnAda Ishavxranu viSuNxvigU barxhamxnigU varavanunx koTaTxdudx; avarigidadx BArxMtiya nAsha.

barxhamxna parxshenxge anusAravAgi maheVshavxrana sadoyxVjAtAdi avatAragaLa karxma, gAyatitxrXV maMtarxda mahime, ivugaLa varaNxne.

sAnxnada eraDu bagegaLu, saMdhAyxvaMdaneya karxma, paMca mahA yajacnxgaLa vidhAna, ivugaLa varaNxne.
shivaliMga pUjeya vidhAna, parxkAra, parxNavadiMda liMgAcaRneya riVti, ivugaLa varaNxne; bAhAyxcaRneya vivara.
mAnasikavAda shivaliMgAcaRneya vidhAna; adanunx neraveVrisuvavara mahime, shivatatavxda savxrUpa vivaraNe;

dAruka vanadalilx nelesidadx munigaLa vaqtAtxMta; munipatinxyaru shivaniMda moVhitarAdudu; QuSigaLa koVpa; QuSi shApagaLa udAharaNegaLu; shivanu kaNamxreyAgalu, munigaLu barxhamxnalilx vijAcnxpisalu, avanu sudashaRnana katheyanunx heVLidanu. yamadharamxna pariVkeSx matutx anugarxha; viveVkadiMda veYrAgayxvanunx hoMdida munigaLige karxma sanAyxsaboVdhane.
shevxVtamuniya kathe; Ayususx mugididadx shevxVtamunigU yamanigU vivAda; shivanalilx marehokakx shevxVtananunx shivanu yamananunx nigarxhisi kApADidudu.

dArukavanada munigaLu shivananunx upAsane mADalu shivanu saMtuSaTxnAdudu.
sutxtiyiMda saMtuSaTxnAda shivanu sheYva sotxVtarxgaLa mahimeyanunx vaNiRsidudu; vAmAcArada viSayadalilx QuSigaLa parxshenx.

dadhiVcaneMba shivaBakatxnAda QuSige kuSxparAjanoDane, bArxhamxNa kaSxtirxyaralilx yArige meVlemx? eMba viSayadalilx jagaLavAgi, dadhiVcanu maheVshavxraniMda vajArxsithx deVhavanunx paDedu, kuSxpananunx jayisidudu; kuSxparAjanu viSuNxvanunx ArAdhisidudu.

sanatukxmArana parxshenxge utatxravAgi naMdiyu tananx utapxtitxya katheyanunx heVLidudu; meVGavAhana kalapxdalilx viSuNxvu meVGavAgi Ishavxrananunx tananx meVle kUDisikoMDidudxdu; viSuNxviniMda barxhamxna utapxtitx; viSuNx barxhamxrige shivana anugarxha.

deVveVMdarxnu shilAdanige yugadharamxgaLanunx vivarisi heVLidudu; kaqtA, terxVtA, dAvxpara, kaliyugagaLalilx muMdAgidadx dharamxgaLa savxrUpa; yugagaLa kAlaparimANa; parxjegaLa jiVvanada riVti niVtigaLu; kaqtayugadalilx varANxsharxma dharAmxcaraNe; niSAkxma karAmxcaraNeyiMda janaralilx shAMti nemamxdi suKagaLu; terxVtAyugadalilx maLe beLegaLanunx avalaMbisi jiVvana; janagaLalilx sAvxthaRparate, atAyxshegaLuMTAdudu; dharamxvu kAluBAga kaDimeyAgidudxdu; kaDege siVtoVSANxdi davxMdavxbAdhe; gaqharacane; vayxvasAya jiVvikAvaqtitx; hadinAlukx bageya dhAnayxgaLu janaru jiVvanakAkxgi sAvxthaRparateyiMda itarara darxvAyxpahAramADalu, janakoSxVBavanunx tapipxsi kApADalu kaSxtitxrXyaranunx gotutxmADidudu; savxdharamxdiMdaleV elalxrU jiVvisabeVkeMba nibaRMdha niyama; yajacnxgaLa AcaraNe; dAvxparadalilx jiVvanavu kaSxTxsAdhayxvAyitu; janaralilx duSaTxBAvagaLu hecicxtu; saMbaLadiMda seVvisuvudu; vANijayxdiMda parasapxra yudadhxgaLuMTAdudu; varANxsharxma dharAmxcaraNege loVpa; itihAsa purANagaLu Binanx BinanxvAdudu; kaliyugadalilx tamoVguNada pArxbalayx; dharamxkekx gAlxni nAshagaLu.

dharamxda savxrUpa matutx Pala; kaliyugadalilxna dharamxda savxrUpa; varANxsharxma dhamaRgaLa loVpa; bArxhamxNaru, kaSxtirxyaru, veYshayxru, shUdarxru ivara hiVna sithxti; kaliyugada koneyalilx saMdhayxMsha kAladalilx viSuNxvina kalikx rUpadalilx avatAra; sAvxyaMBuva manu putarxnAda parxmitiya kathe; matetx kaqtayugada AraMBavAguva karxma; kalapx manavxMtaragaLa vivaraNe.
barxhamxnu dAkASxyaNiV deVviya putarxnAda kathe; tirxmUritxgaLalilx obabxru matotxbabxriMda uMTAda kathe; barxhamxnu mahAdeVvananunx sutxtisidudu; adhaR nAriVshavxra mUtiRya AviBARva;
tapasisxniMda saMtoVSagoMDa maheVshavxranu shilAda munige putarxnanunx anugarxhisidudu; naMdiVshavxrana utAsxha; shilAdamuniya aBivaMdana;
naMdiyu manuSayx rUpavanunx paDedu rudarxnanunx ArAdhisidudu; shivana anugarxhada vivaraNe;
naMdiyanunx samasatxgaNagaLigU adhipatiyanAnxgi paTATxBiSeVkamADidudu; viSuNx, iMdarx muMtAdavarU shivananunx sutxtisidudu;

sUtanu samaSiTxrUpavAda shivana shariVrada savxrUpavanunx QuSigaLige vivarisi heVLutAtx, modalu pAtALaloVka muMtAda adhoVloVkagaLanunx vivarisidudu; sutala loVkadalilx kAlaneVmi muMtAdavaru; talAtaladalilx viroVcana, hitaNAyxkaSx, naraka muMtAdavaru; vitala loVkadalilx tAraka, parxhAlxda, muMtAdavaru; mahAtalaloVkadalilx namuci muMtAdavaru; elelxDeyalUlx deVviVsahita shivanu iruvudu;
BUloVkadalilxruva divxVpagaLu, sAgaragaLu, pirxyavarxtarAjana putarxra deVshaviBAgagaLu; divxVpagaLa adhipatigaLa varaNxneyu
jaMbU divxVpada vaSaRBAgagaLanUnx BarataKaMDadalilx AginxVdharxrAjana vaMsha visAtxravanUnx vivarisidudu; oMbatutx vaSaRgaLige AginxVdharxrAjana makakxLu rAjarAdudu; AginxVdharxna tapasusx;
meVru paravxta muMtAda paravxtagaLa parimANagaLu; eMTu jana dikApxlakara paTaTxNagaLu; tirxmUritxgaLa vimAnAdigaLa vivaraNe;

jaMbUdivxVpada savxrUpa; jaMbUnadi; itara vaSaRgaLu, avugaLa AkAra, saninxveVsha, alilxna paravxtagaLu, nadigaLu, muMtAdavugaLa varaNxne; himavatapxravxta, maMdara, gaMdhamAdana, muMtAda elelx kaTiTxna paravxtagaLa varaNxne, parimANagaLa vivaragaLu; mahAvaqkaSxgaLa varaNxne; ivugaLiMda BUdhAraNakArayx; vaqSiTxkarxma; AdisheVSana visheVSa parxyoVjanagaLu; saMtAnaka kalapxvaqkaSx;

maMgaLakaravAda gaMgeyu udaBxvisida bageyu matutx BAratada oMbatutx vaSaRgaLalilx janara varANxdigaLu, muMtAdudara varaNxne; BUmaMDalada vivara visheVSagaLa varaNxne;

palxkaSx divxVpavanunx modalu mADikoMDu karxmavAgi BUloVka, savxgaR muMtAda UdhavxRloVkagaLa vaNaRne. naraka vaNaRne. matutx yakaSxra AhAra vihArAdi savaR vayxvahAragaLa vaNaRne; BArata vaSaRda athaR; barxhAmxMDada vivaragaLu.

caMdarxna utatxmavAda rathada varaNxne; deVvategaLu kaqSaNx pakaSxdalilx caMdarxkaleyanunx pAna mADuvudariMdalU, shukalxpakaSxdalilx sUyaRnu suSumA, eMba hesaruLaLx tananx nADiyiMda caMdarxnanunx kalA dAna mUlakavAgi poVSaNa paDisuvudariMdalU, caMdarxnu kaqSiNxpakaSxdalilx matutx shukalxpakaSxdalilx karxmavAgi kalA hiVnanAguvudara matutx kalA pUNaRnAguvudara varaNxne.
joyxVtishacxkarxdalilx maMgaLa, budhaneV modalAda garxhagaLa aLate matutx calane, matutx rathaveV modalAdudara varaNxne.
barxhamxnu shivana parxsAdadiMda sUyaRneV modalAdavaranunx garxhagaLige adhipatigaLanAnxgi mADi avarige pArxmuKayxda sAthxnagaLalilx paTATxBiSeVkavanunx mADida bage.

aidu mahA garxhagaLa savxBAva matutx savxrUpagaLa sapxSaTxvAda vaNaRne; sUyaRna ELu muKayx kiraNagaLa vaNaRne; sUyaRna mahimeya vivaraNe.

dakaSxbarxhamxniMda deVvategaLeV modalu mADikoMDu vasiSaThxneV muMtAda mAnasaputarxra matutx dAnavAdigaLavaregU saqSiTxyAda bageya varaNxne.

vasiSaThxna maganAda shakitx muniyu tananx tamamxMdiroMdige kADige baralu, avananunx rudhira, eMba rAkaSxsanu tiMdu hAkida viSaya; tanUmxlakavAgi vasiSaThxna shoVka; rudhira muMtAda rAkaSxsaranunx nAsha mADuvudu; shakitxya patinxyalilx parAshara mahaSiRya utapxtitxya viSaya, ivugaLa varaNxne.

yayAti mahArAjanavaregU muMduvarida, caMdarx vaMshada vaNaRne; sUyaR vaMshadalilx huTiTxda tirxdhanavxneV modalAda rAjara vaMshAvaLigaLa vivaraNe.

yayAtiya hiriya maganAda yadu mahArAjaneV kaqSANxvatArakekx kAraNanAdadxriMda, yaduvanunx modalu mADikoMDu sAtavxta, eMvuvavanavaregU yaduvaMshada varaNxne.
yadu vaMshadalilx BUmiya BAra BUtarAda rAkaSxsara nAshadiMda BU BAravanunx tagigxsuvudakAkxgi shirxV kaqSaNxnu avatarisida bage; saMkeSxVpa shirxV kaqSaNxna cariterxya varaNxneyU saha.

shwnakAdi QuSigaLu sUtamahaSiRyanunx kuritu AdisagaRra vivara visAtxragaLanunx heVLabeVkeMdu; karamxda savxrUpa, daqSiTx matutx Pala; parxkaqtigU puruSarigU shivanu niyAmakanu; parxkaqti athavA parxdhAnada savxrUpa; saqSiTxge pUravxdalilx parabarxhamxtatavx oMdeV ididxtu; saMkalapx, adhayxvasAyagaLu, ahaMkAra, paMcaBUtatanAmxtarxgaLu; iMdirxyagaLu, manasusx, ivu uMTAduvu; paqthivAyxdigaLa guNagaLu; parxthamashariVriV, barxhAmx, sarasavxtiV, viSuNx, lakiSxmXV, ivara AviBARva; saqSiTxyakAla parameVshavxrana hagalu, parxLayakAla avana rAtirx; parxkaqtiya satavxrajasatxmoVguNagaLalilx veYSamayxdiMda saqSiTx, sAmayxveV parxlaya; manavxMtaragaLu; nArAyaNa shabAdxthaR; varAha rUpadiMda BUmiya udadhxraNa; avideyxyiMda saqSiTxparxlaya; deVvategaLa, mAnavara, saqSiTx; rAkaSxsara saqSiTx; pakiSx, maqgagaLa saqSiTx; karamxsavxrUpa, PalagaLu; veVdashabadxdiMda saqSATxyXraMBavu; pAravxtiya savxrUpa, AviBARvagaLu.

parameVshavxraniMda tirxpuradahana katheya vivaraNe; tirxpura nirAmxNa; viduyxnAmxliV, tArakAkaSx, kamalAkaSxrige vara; deVvategaLigU, dharamxkUkx gAlxni; nArAyaNanu yAgadiMda shivananunx ArAdhisidudu; rAkaSxsara dharAmxcaraNege mAyA puruSana upadeVshadiMda viGAnxcaraNe, rAkaSxsara dharamxtAyxga; turxpura dahanakekx naMdiVshavxrana mAtinaMte sidadhxtegaLu;

vishavxkaramxniMda nirAmxNa; pashupatiyAda shivana salaheyaMte deVvategaLu pashugaLAdudu; pAshupata varxtadiMda adara moVcaneyAguvudeMdu shivana anugarxha; viGanx nivAraNegAgi vinAyakana ArAdhane; deVvagaNagaLoDane shivanu yudadhxkekx horaTanu; barxhamxnu sArathiyAgidudxdu; shivanu pAshupatAsatxrXvanunx hUDi, tirxpuragaLanunx noVDalu, avu oMdAdudu; tirxpura dahana; deVvategaLu shivananunx sutxtisidaru; barxhamxnu sArathiyAgiyU viSuNxvu vAhanavAgiyU idudxdu.

barxhamxnu liMgAcaRneya mahimeyanunx vivarisidudu; tirxpurAsuraru I dharamxniSaThxrAgidadx parayxMtavAgi ajeVyarAgidadxru. idanunx biTaTx meVle tirxpura dahanavAyitu; deVvategaLu pAshupatavarxtAcaraNeyiMda tamamx pashutavxvanunx biTuTx shudadhxrAdaru; alilxMda I varxtavu rUDhige baMditu.

vishavxkaramxnu deVvategaLige liMgagaLanunx takakxMte racisikoTaTxnu; aneVka bageya liMgagaLu; avugaLa acaRneya PalagaLu; liMgadalilx mUladalilx barxhamxnU, madhayxdalilx viSuNxvU, meVlu BAgadalilx rudarxnU, elalxkUkx meVle parxNava rUpiyAda sadAshivanU, nelesirutAtxre; liMgagaLa parxtiSAThxpaneyu puNayxkaravAdudu;

niSakxlavAda shivanu sakalanAdudu heVge? OMkAra rUpiyAda BagavaMtanu jAcnxnasavxrUpanu; adariMdaleV mukitxyu; deVvaranunx jAcnxpakakekx taruvudu; liMgavu; iDiya barxhAmxMDaveV liMga rUpaveMdu dhAyxnisabeVku; paMcamahABUtagaLU liMgadalilxve; vaNARsharxmagaLU liMgadiMda uMTAdudu; parashivanu karAmxtamxnAgi saravx parxkaqtigU parxvataRkanAdanu; karamx, yajacnx, tapoVyajacnx, japa, dhAnayx, yajacnxgaLu jAcnxna sAdhanagaLu; yoVgi haqdayadalilx niSakxla liMgada sAninxdhayxvirutatxde; parAnaMdaveV liMgavu; bAhayx matutx ABayxMtara liMgagaLu; sUthxla, sUkaSxmXliMgagaLu; adhikArAnuguNavAda liMga pUjeyu saPalavu. elalxvU shivaliMgavAgide; liMgavu upAsanegAgi kalipxtavAgide; shivashakitx, sakala niSakxla aBeVda BAvane Avashayxka; shivAdevxYta BAvane sherxVyasakxravu;

shivaliMga parxtiSeThx, shivAlaya nirAmxNa; kamaR PalagaLu; shivAlayadalilx seVveyu puNayxdAyakavAdudu; savxyaMBU liMgada mahime; shivakeSxVtarx vAyxpitx; keVdAra, parxBAsa, kAshi, muMtAda keSxVtarx dashaRna, vAsa, tiVthaRsAnxna, shiva pUjA, muMtAdudara PalagaLu; sUkarakUkx uMTAda puNayx Pala; mAnasa vAcika kAyika pApagaLU nivAraNeyAgutatxve. varaNxmaMDala racane matutx pUjeya Pala; shivaneV Adi deVvanU pUjayxnU AgirutAtxne; cAMdArxyaNAdi pArxyashicxtatx savxrUpa; savAyxpasavayxnAyxyadiMda parxdakiSxNe;

ahiMsA varxtavanunx pAlisuva saluvAgi vasatxrXdiMda shoVdhisidas niVranenxV shivArAdhaneyalilx upayoVgisabeVku; gaqhasathxnige paMcasUnA doVSa saMbaMdha; pArxNigaLu kApADuvavananunx rakiSxsutatxve; hiMsakananunx nAshamADutatxve; AdudariMda kAyika, vAcika, mAnasikavAda mUru bageya hiMseyanUnx biDabeVku. veVdavihitavAda yAgadalilx pashuvinas hiMseyu doVSAvahavalalx; ahiMseyiMda rudarxloVka pArxpitxyu Palavu; sitxrXVyaru yAvAgalU rakaSxNiVyaru, avaranunx hiMsisabAradu; shivaBakitxya mahime;

deVvategaLu pashutavxvanunx kaLedu koMDa bage; avaru keYlAsakekx hoVgi shivadashaRna mADidudu; viSuNxvinoDane, BoVgayx eMba shiva vAsasAthxnakekx hoVdudu; meVru paravxta varaNxne, alilx pura varaNxne; deVvategaLoDane barxhamxnU viSuNxvU shivana puravanunx parxveVshisidaru; parxthama vimAnadalilx gaNeVshanAda naMdiya dashaRna; avana mUlaka shiva dashaRna; avana mUlaka shiva dashaRna; pAshupatavarxtavanunx shivanu deVvategaLige upadeVshisidudu; elalxrU A pAshupata varxtAcaraNeyiMda pashutavxvanunx kaLedukoMDu tamamx sAthxnagaLige hiMtirugidaru;

shivaliMgadAna varxtagaLa vivaraNe; vaSaRnakatx pUjAvarxta; upavAsa, BeYkaSx, ayAcita, nakatx varxtagaLu; shivavarxta; mAsavisheVSagaLalilx pUjA visheVSa; aSaTxmiV, catudaRshiV tithigaLalilx shivapUjA; sAmAnayx niyamagaLu; ahiMsAdigaLu;

elalx varxta pUjegaLalUlx paMcAkaSxriV japavu AvashayxkavAdudu; paMcAkaSxriV videyx; parxLaya kAladalilx parameVshavxrana savxrUpa, shivanobabxneV idudx, shiva, shakitx, rUpadiMda, jiVva, Ishavxra, rUpadiMda athavA paraxkaqti, puruSa, rUpadiMda toVruvudu; tirxmUritxgaLu tirxguNa saMbaMdha visheVSadiMda AviBaRvisuvudu; saqSiTx karxma, barxhamxna mAnasa putarxrige shakitxdAna mADalu pArxthaRne; shivana paMca muKagaLiMda paMcAkaSxriV maMtarxda parxkaTana upadeVshagaLu; barxhamxnu adanunx garxhisi putarxrige upadeVsha mADidudu; avaru adanunx muMjavAnf eMba paravxtadalilx japisi sidadhxrAdudu; adariMda loVka, veVda, dharamxgaLa rakaSxNe; A maMtarxda biVja, shakitx, deVvategaLu; parxNava savxrUpa; nAyxsa parxkAragaLu; utapxtitx, sithxti, saMhAra, eMdu mUru bageya nAyxsagaLu; parxNavadiMda saMpuTiV karaNa; I maMtarxdiMda upadeVshagaLanunx paDeyuva karxma; AmeVle japisuva karxma; japa saragaLa maNigaLu; avugaLiMdAguva Pala; pArxNAyAmada Avashayxkate matutx Pala; japa saMKeyx, dikukxgaLu; beraLugaLu; ahiMseyiMda japayajacnxvu sherxVSaThxvAdudu; vAcika, upAMshu, mAnasa, eMdu japada mUru bagegaLu; japasididhxge sadAcAravu Avashayxka; varANxsharxma dharAmxcaraNeyeV sadAcAravu; gArxhAyxgArxhAyxnanxgaLu; parxtigarxha viveVcaneV; bekukx, nAyi, gaLiMda manege ashudidhx; shudidhxkArakagaLu; guruveV shivanu, shivaneV guruvu; guruBakitx seVvA mahime; maMtarxviniyoVga karxma; garxhaNakAladalilx japa; bArxhimxVsapAna meVdhAkAraka; hoVmakarxma; ABicArikakUkx parxtiVkAra; pArxyashicxtatx dharamx rUpavAda japa; japasididhxPalagaLu;

japayajacnxkikxMta dhAyxnayajacnxvu meVlAdudu; kAlakUTaveMba viSaharaNa shakitxgiMta saMsAra viSaharaNa sAmathayxRvu migilAdudu; kAma, dharamx adharamxgaLiMda saMsAra parxvaqtitx; ajAcnxnigaLAda ashakatxrige parxvaqtitxdharamx, samathaRrAda jAcnxnigaLige nivaqtitxdharamx; nArakiV, savxgiRV, mAnava eMdu jiVvara mUrubage; udiBxjajx, sevxVdaja, aMDaja, jarAyuja eMdu nAlukx bage; jAcnxna sanAyxsagaLiMdaleV mukitxpArxpitxyu; saMsAradalilx duHKaveV; suKAnu BavadiMda kAmashAMtavAgadu; duHKamisharx, kaSxya, sAtishaya, doVSagaLiMda kAmayxPalagaLu suKavalalxvu; barxhamx parayxMtavAda adhikAravU duHKaveV; paravideyx, aparavideyx; avasAthxtarxyadalilx tirxmUritxgaLu; turiVyaneV parashivanu; daharAkAshadalilxruva Atamxnu shivaneV; parameVshavxranige elalxvU ananxvu; karamxdiMda moVkaSxvAgadu; jAcnxnadiMda mukitx; vishavx, teYjasa, pArxjAcnxtiVtanAda AtamxneV barxhamx; I aparoVkaSx jAcnxnavu guruvina IkaSxNAnugarxhadiMda; jAcnxniyu jiVvanumxkatxnu; karatxvAyxBAyxsavanunx biTuTx jAcnxnABAyxsavanunx mADabeVku; dhAyxnadiMda jAcnxna; diVGaRgoVLAkAravAda daharAkAsha, shariVra, aSaTxmUritx, barxhAmxMDa, sUrayx saMsAthxnavanenxV parxteyxVkavAgiTuTxkoMDu parashivadhAyxna mADabeVku; jAcnxna, veYrAgayx, amAnitAvxdigaLu, QuNatarxyapariharaNa, guruBakitx, gaLiMda barxhamxjAcnxna lABa; saMsAra kAlakUTa nirUmxlana, moVkaSxpArxpitxyAgutatxde; jAcnxna mahime, pAshupata varxta mAhAtamxyX, yoVga sididhxyAgutatxde; Palashurxti;

sanatukxmAra muMtAda munigaLu parameVshavxrananunx kuritu idelalxvU shivasavxrUpavAdarem umAmaheVshavxrAdi tirxmUritx rUpadiMdalU, jiVveVshavxra rUpadiMdalU, parxkaqtipuruSara rUpadiMdalU, I jagadavxyXvahAravu heVge? eMdu keVLidaru. baMdha moVkaSxgaLelalxvU, kataRqtavx, BoVkatxqtavx, janana, maraNagaLelalxvU adhAyxroVpa apavAda nAyxyadiMda mAyikaveMdu vivarisidudu; parameVshavxranu BavAniVdeVviyanunx hasanunxKanAgi noVDalu, A tAyiya anugarxhadiMda mAyeya tereyu hoVgi jAcnxnoVdaya; umAshaMkarara aBeVdavanunx managaMDaru; elalx jiVvarU BavAMshajaru; umAshaMkara parxsAdadiMdaleV neVravAgi nitAyxnaMdarUpavAda mukitxyu elalxrigU karxmavAgi doreyutatxde; ideV shiva sAyujayxvu.

yoVgAMgaLanunx aBAyxsamADuvudariMda uMTAguva PalagaLu; yoVgadasavxrUpa, aNimA, mahimA, laGimA, garimA, pArxpitx, pArxkAmayx, Ishitavx, eMba aSeTxYshavxrayxgaLu; ivugaLalilx sAvadayx, niravadayx, sUkaSxmX, eMdu mUru bage; sididhxgaLu moVkaSxkekx aDiDxgaLu; avakekx mana soVlada upAsakanu moVkaSxvanUnx paDeyuvanu. moVkaSxda hecucxgArike; yoVgaBarxSaTxna punajaRnamx, gaBaRvAsa, huTuTx, beLavaNige, suKa duHKAnuBava, I nibaRMdha duHKadiMda biDugaDeyAgabeVkAdare IshavxrAnugarxhavubeVku; Aru bageya janamxgaLu; dharAmxcaraNeyiMdaleV sadagxtiyU, kaDege moVkaSxvU doreyutatxde; pArxNAginx hoVtarxkarxmada vivaragaLu;

shwcAcAradasavxrUpa; mAnAvamAnagaLu viSAmaqtagaLu; guruseVvA, yamaniyamapAlana, deVshATana, daqSiTx shudadhx saMcAra, shudadhxjalapAna, satayxvadana, manashuyxdAdhxcaraNa; BikASxjiVvana; cAMdArxyaNa, asetxVyAdigaLu, saMdhAyxkaramx, deVvapUjA, shucitavxsaMpAdana; sUtakagaLu; shAvAshwca, varANxsharxma BeVdadiMda shwcaBeVda; dAMpatayxdharamx, putarxna Pala, paDeyuvakarxma, dharamxveV tArakavu;
pApashoVdhana, tirxvidhapApagaLu, pArxyashicxtatxgaLu; pArxNAyAma, kaqcaCxrX, cAMdArxyaNAdigaLu;

kAshiVkeSxVtarx mahimeya vivaragaLu; kurukeSxVtarx, shirxVparavxta; avimukatxkeSxVtarx, IshavxroVdAyxnagaLa varaNxne; parxyAgakeSxVtarx; dharamxkekx satayxvU, moVkaSxkekx shamavU, tiruLAgide; ililx shivanu yAvAgalU biDade saninxhitanAgiruvudariMda idu avimukatxveniside; yoVgasididhxyu ililx sulaBa matutx shiVGarxvAgi laBisutatxde; sidadhxru jeYgiVSavayx, kubeVra, iMdarx, vAyxsa, muMtAdavaru; barxhAmx, viSuNx shivaliMgaparxtiSeThxmADi pUjisidaru: vAyxGerxVshavxrakeSxVtarx, himavaMtanu sheYleVshavxraliMga parxtiSeThxmADi pUjisidanu; saMgameVshavxra, shukerxVshavxra, muMtAda shivaliMgagaLu; pAravxtige sidadhxyoVgigaLa joyxVtidashaRnavAdudu; keSxVtarxtiVthaR visheVSagaLalilx tithi visheVSagaLalilx PalavisheVSagaLu; pUjA, japa, dhAyxnagaLa Pala;

satiVdeVviya AviBARva; shiva shakitx, liMga veVdi, puruSasitxrXVtatavx, parabarxhamx mAyA, puruSa parxkaqti, ivara samAyoVgadiMda adhaRnAriVshavx rAviBARvavAyitu. AmeVle barxhamxnU, hiraNayxgaBaRnU, rudarxnU AviBaRvisalu, barxhamxnu pArxthiRsidaMte vAmAMgadiMda deVviyu avatarisi, A deVviyeV dakaSxputirxyAda satiVdeVviyAgi, shivananenxV maduveyAdaLu; dakaSxnu shivananunx niMdisalu yAgAginxyalilx deVhatAyxgamADi, paravxtarAjana putirxyAgi pAravxtiyAdaLu.

dakaSxnayAgadalilx satiVdeVviyu deVhatAyxga mADalu, shivanu viVraBadarxnanunx uMTumADi kaLuhisalu, avanu tananx gaNagaLoDane hoVgi A yAgadalilx BAgavanunxvahisidadx iMdarx, Baga, pUSA, caMdarx, aginx, yama, viSuNx, yajacnx puruSa, dakaSx, sarasavxtiV ivareV muMtAdavaranunx nigarxhisidudu; A meVle barxhamxna pArxthaRneyaMte shAMtanAdudu; alilx shivanU AviBaRvisi elalxrigU pUravxdaMte pArxNadAnamADidudu;

pAravxtiya tapasisxniMda saMtuSaTxnAda parameVshavxranu varANxsharxma dharamxgaLanunx udAharaNeyiMda kApADuvudakAkxgi pAravxtiVdeVviyanunx vivAha mADikoMDa kathe; pAravxtiyu tapasusx mADutitxruvAga barxhamxnu baMdu shivanuvarisuvaneMdu heVLidudu; shivanuvarisuvaneMdu heVLidudu; shivanu bArxhamxNa veVSadiMda pAravxtiya tapoVvanakekx baMdu opipxdudu; pAravxtiya savxyaMvarakAkxgi deVvategaLU, QuSigaLU, maMTapadalilxdadxru, shivanu shishuvAgi pAravxtiya toDeyameVlidudxdu; iMdArxdiloVkapAlakarU, rudarx, viSuNx muMtAdavarU satxMBitarAdudu; barxhamxnu shivana I liVleyanunx managaMDu A parameVshavxrananunx sutxtisidudu; deVvAdigaLU sutxtisalu, shivanu avarige divayx daqSiTxyanunx koTuTx anugarxhisi satxMBanavanunx tapipxsidudu;

vinAyakana utapxtitxya kathe; rAkaSxsarige AgAgegx ucaCxrXyasithxtiyanunx paDeyuvudu avara dharAmxcaraNege viGanxvilalxdudariMda eMdu deVvategaLu tiLidu, aMtaha rAkaSxsara kAmayx dharAmxcaraNege viGanxgaLanunxMTumADalu Ishavxrananunx sutxtisidaru; iMdarx, aginx muMtAdavaru mADida shivasotxVtarx mahime.

deVvategaLu mADida sotxVtarxdiMda saMtuSaTxnAda parameVshavxranu avarige divayx dasaRnavanunx anugarxhisi, avara koVrikeyanunx salilxsalu gaNeVshananunx uMTumADidanu; A vinAyakananunx elalxrU tamamx tamamx kArAyxraMBadalilx pUjisabeVkeMdU, hAge mADade idadxre avara kArayxgaLige viGanxvanunxMTumADabeVkeMdU shivanu gotutxmADidanu; barxhAmx, viSuNx, rudarxrU, vANiV, lakiSxmXV, umAdeVviyarU hAge mADabeVkeMdu gotutx mADidanu; duSaTxrAgi kAmayx tapasasxnunx mADuva rAkaSxsAdigaLsa dharAmxcaraNegU aDiDxyanunx uMTumADeMdu shivanu viGenxVshavxrananunx kuritu heVLalu, gaNapatiyu viGanxgaLanunx saqjisidanu.

tAMDaveVshavxrana kathe; parameVshavxrana naqtayxkekx kAraNa, adara parxkAragaLa vivaraNe; dArukaneMba rAkaSxsanu kAmayx tapasisxdidhxya mahimeyiMda loVka kaMTakanAdanu; avanu sitxrXVmAtarx vadhayxneMdu tiLidu deVvategaLu sitxrXVrUpavanunx dharisi yudadhxmADidarU deVvategaLeV jitarAdaru. avaru barxhamxnoDane parameVshavxrananunx mare hokukx sutxtisidaru; adariMda tuSaTxnAda shivanu avara koVrikeyanunx salilxsalu pAvaRtiyanunx pArxthiRsidanu; deVviyu tananx aMshadiMda shivananunx parxveVshisi kaMThadalilxdadx viSadiMda mahAkALiyanunxMTu mADidaLu; A BayaMkara mUtiRyiMda sidadhxrU pishAcigaLU uMTAdaru; dArukAsurana saMhAra; shivanu bAlakana rUpadalilx aLutitxralu, kALiyu avanige satxnayxkoTuTxdu; AdariMda kALiyu koVpavanUnx hiVri shAMtiyanunxMTumADidanu; adariMda avanige keSxVtarx pAlaneMdu hesarAdudu; mahAkALiya saMtoVSakAkxgi shivana tAMDavanaqtayx; saMtuSaTxLAda kALiyU lAsayxnataRnamADidaLu; QuSigaLa yoVgABAyxsada AnaMdadiMda shivanataRnavAyiteMdu inonxMdu mata;

upamanuyxvina kathe; upamanuyxvu mAvana maneyalilx kuDidaMtaha hAlanunx koDeMdu tAyiyanunx keVLalu, baDatanadiMda hAlilalxdiralu, avaLu hiTaTxnunx niVrinalilx kadari hAleMdu koTaTxLu; maganu aLalu hAlanunx paDeyuva puNayxvanunx shiva pUjeyiMda paDeyabeVkeMdu heVLidaLu; upamanuyxvu shivananunx kuritu tapasusxmADalu, avana tapoVjAvxleyiMda mUru loVkavU tapisalu, iMdarxnu parxtayxkaSxnAgi tAneV varavanunx koDuvudAgiyU, shivadhAyxnavanunx biDeMdU heVLalu, upamanuyxvu shivananunx niMdisida iMdarxnanunx maMtArxsatxrXdiMda nigarxhisi, shivaniMdAsharxvaNa mADida tananx deVhavanunx biDalu nishacxyisiralu, shivanu parxtayxkaSxnAgi hAlu, mosaru tupapx ivugaLa samudarxvanenxV anugarxhisi, avananunx tananx putarxnanAnxgi aMgiVkarisidanu; avana koVrikeyaMte shivaBakitxyanUnx karuNisidanu;

shirxVkaqSaNxnu upamanuyx mahaSiRgaLanunx paDedu avaniMda pAshupatavarxtada karxmavanunx tiLida bage; pAshupata jAcnxnaveMdare adevxYta barxhAmxtemxYkayxjAcnxnavu; pAshupatavarxtAcaraNeyiMda kaqSaNxnu putarxnananx paDedudu; pAshupata varxtada diVkASxgarxhaNakekx beVkAda upasakxragaLa dAnavU moVkaSxsAdhanavAda matotxMdu varxtaveMdu upadeVsha; pAshupatavarxtaniSaThxnAda yoVgige saravxsavxdAmadiMda mahAPalavuMTu; adhurxvavAdarU I shariVraveMba dharamxsAdhanadiMda dhurxvaPalavAda moVkaSxvU sididhxsutatxde;

suKasAdhana dharamx parxshenx, aMbariVSanige mAkaRMDeVyanu heVLidudxdanunx, shwnakAdi QuSigaLige sUtanu heVLidudu; viSuNx Bakitxya savxrUpa PalagaLu; sAMbapirxyanAda viSuNxvige gAnadiMda saMtoVSa; kashikaneMba bArxhamxNanu viSuNx kiVtaRnagaLanunx hADutitxdudxdu; mAlava, mUlaviV eMba veYshayxdaMpatigaLa seVve; kusha sathxLada bArxhamxNarU seVridudu; kaLiMga deVshada doreyu tananxnUnx BajisireMdudu; opapxdidadx avaranunx deVshadiMda horaDisidudu; kaDege avarige viSuNxsArUpayx pArxpitx; sidadhxsAdhayxreMba deVvategaLAdaru; nAradana Agamana, tuMburuvina gAna sanAmxna;
kwshikAdigaLige nArada tuMburugaLoDane samAna gwrava; viSuNxvu gAnapirxyanu; BagavaMtana guNagAnada mahime;

nAradanu heVge gAna videyxyanunx kalitaneMdu aMbariVSanu keVLalu mAkaRMDeVyanu nAradaneV heVLidudxdanunx tiLisidanu; nAradanu ashariVravANiyaMte mAnasoVtatxra paravxtadalilx gAna baMdhuveMba ulUka pakiSxyalilx gAnABAyxsa mADidudu; adara Atamxkathe; BuvaneVshaneMba doreyu veVdAnadhikArigaLige mAtarx gAnABAyxsada apapxNemADidudxdu; harimitarxneMba bArxhamxNana viSuNxBajane; matutx sadagxti pArxpitx; gAnakarxma, lajejxyanunx gAyakanu biDabeVku; gAyakanalilxrabeVkAda guNagaLu matutx biDabeVkAda doVSagaLu; tuMburuvige viVNeyalilx savxradeVvategaLa sAkASxtAkxra; nArAyaNanu nAradananunx tuMburu samAnanalalxvenanxlu A meVle nAradanige satayxBAmA, jAMbavatiyaralilx gAna shikASxBAyxsa; gAyana shAsatxrXda mahime viSuNx Bajaneya mahime;
veYSaNxva Bakatxra lakaSxNagaLu; veYSaNxvara mahime; viSuNx BakatxrigiMta rudarx Bakatxra hecucx gArike matutx Pala;

viSuNxBakatxnAda aMbariVSa mahArAjana kathe; tirxshaMkuvU avana heMDitiyAda padAmxvatiyU viSuNxpUjeyanunx mADutitxdadx riVti; nArAyaNanu iMdarxrUpadalilx goVcarisalu, ananayx BakatxrAda avaru avananunx beVDalolalxdiralu, savxsavxrUpadalilxyeV dashaRnavitutx, koVrikegaLanunx anugarxhisi, sudashaRna cakarxvanUnx koTaTxnu; shirxVmatiV eMba magaLAdaLu; nArada, paravxtara Agamana; ivaribabxrU A kaneyxyanunx apeVkiSxsi, parasapxrara muKavu kapiyaMte matutx goVlAMgUladaMte AgaleMdu varavanunx viSuNxvinalilx beDidudu; ivaribabxranUnx shirxVmatiyu varisade avara samiVpadalilxdadx viSuNxvanenxV varisidudu; A QuSigaLu rAjananunx shapisalu, tapasusx cakarxdiMda hiMtirugi QuSigaLanenxV piVDisidudu; Aga BakatxpirxyakAriyAda viSuNxvu tamasasxnunx kuritu rAmAvatAradalilx tananxlilxge barabeVkeMdu heVLidudu; nAradaparavxtaru viSuNxmAyeyiMda vaMcitarAgalu, rudarxBakatxrAdudu;

jeyxVSAThxdeVviya kathe; samudarxmathanadalilx lakiSxmXV huTuTxvudakikxMta muMce huTiTxdadx alakiSxmXyeV jeyxVSAThxdeVviV; dusasxha QuSiyu avaLanunx maduveyAgi ajAcnxniyAdudu; mAkaRMDeVyanu A lakiSxmXVdusasxharu irabeVkAda matutx irabArada sathxLagaLanunx tiLisidudu; dusasxhanu vAsasathxLavanunx noVDibaralu pAtALakekx hoVdudu; alakiSxmXyu lakiSxmXVnArAyaNaranunx kaMDu jiVvanamAgaRvanunx keVLalu Bakatxralalxdavara dhanAdigaLanunx toVrisidudu;

alakiSxmXV nivaqtitxgAgiyU, lakiSxmXVpArxpitx goVsakxravU lakiSxmXVnArAyaNa maMtarxjapavu Avashayxkavu; mahAviSuNxvina aSATxkaSxriV, dAvxdashAkaSxriV maMtarxjapada mahime; aitareVyaneMba bArxhamxNana kathe; yAgakAladalilx alilxge baMdu avanu vAsudeVva maMtarx diMda pUjayxnAdudu

viSuNxvina maMtarxgaLigiMta shivana maMtarxgaLa hecucxgArikeyu; dhuMdhumUkana magana kathe; avanu patitanAgidudx kaDege baqhasapxtiyiMda paMcAkaSxra SaDakaSxra maMtarxgaLanunx upadeVshadiMda kalitu opipxsi sadagxtiyanunx paDedudu

pAshupatavarxtavanunx kaqSaNxneV muMtAda deVvategaLu mADidudu; sanatukxmAranige naMdikeVshavxranu (sheYlAdiyu) pAshupatavarxtavanunx vivarisidudxdanunx sUtanu QuSigaLige heVLidudu; pashu, pAsha, pati, I tatavxgaLa vivaraNeyu; parxNavavu shivAvAcakavu; yAjacnxvalakxyXnige sUrayxna upadeVsha; pAshupatayoVgasavxrUpa; shivaneV pashupatiyu;

parameVshavxrana apapxNeyaMteyeV elalxrU tamamx tamamx kArayxgaLanunx neraveVrisutitxdAdxre; loVkapAlakarU loVka saqSATxyXdi kArakarAda tirxmUtiRgaLU, parashivana AjAcnxdhArakaru; shivaneV pashugaLa pAshavimoVcakanu; shivanu pAshabaMdharahitanu

umAmaheVshavxrara mahime; avara viBUtigaLeV itara deVvategaLu; sitxrXVyarelalxrU umAviBUtiya aMsharu; puruSarelalxrU maheVshavxrana biBUtiya aMsharu; parashivaparamAtamxna virADUrxpa vishavxrUpavaraNxne; shivaliMgapUjeyiMda elalx deVvategaLigU taqpitxyuMTAgutatxde; shirxVrAmanu samudarxtiVradalilx shivaliMgavanunx sAthxpisi pUjisidudu;
parashivana aSaTxmUritx savxrUpada vivaraNe; I aSaTx mUtiRgaLiMdaleV jagatitxna saqSiTx, sithxti, upasaMhAragaLu naDeyutitxrutatxve.

parashivana aSaTxmUritxgaLalilx beVre beVreyAgi paMcaBUtagaLa aMshagaLanUnx I parxpaMcada vasutxgaLalilx gurutisuvudakekx anukUlavAgiruvaMte vivarisi samanavxya mADiruvudu; shivana mUritxgaLa saMjecnxgaLu, avara patinxyarU, muMtAda paraMpare;

paMcabarxhamxsavxrUpanAda shivana saravx tatAvxtamxkavAda savxrUpavanunx vivarisiruvudu; jagatitxna saqSATxyXdigaLanunx neraveVrisuva barxhAmx, viSuNx, rudarx, Ishavxra, sadAshiva, ivara savxrUpavanunx sadoyxVjAtAdi savxrUpaveMdu vivaraNe; hAgeyeV shivanu keSxVtarxjacnx muMtAda ipapxtetxYdu tatavxsavxrUpaneMba vivaraNe;
saravx savxrUpanAda parameVshavxrana tatavxda vivaragaLanunx QuSigaLu nAnAbageyAgi variNxsiruvudu; itara dashaRnagaLalilx heVLiruva tatavxgaLoDane avanunx samanavxyamADiruvudu;
shivarUpagaLanUnx avugaLa hesarugaLanUnx munigaLu tamamx garaxMthagaLalilx nAnAparxkAravAgi heVLiruvudanunx parxtayxBijecnxyiMda gurutisalu anukUlavAguvaMte vivarisiruvudu;
rudarxdeVvana saguNa savxrUpadiMda parxpaMcada saqSiTxyAda bageyanUnx, avanu deVvategaLanunx kuritu tiLiya heVLida tananx savxrUpada visheVSavanUnx vivarisiruvudu;
barxhAmx muMtAda deVvategaLu shivananunx sutxtisidudu; pAshupatavarxtada vidhAnavU, saMtuSaTxnAda shivaniMda varaparxsAdada lABAvU, ivanunx variNxsiruvudu; OMkArasavxrUpada visheVSavivaraNe;

saMtuSaTxnAda maheVshavxranu sUrayxmaMDalasathxnAgi deVvategaLa matutx QuSigaLa parxshenxge utatxravAgi yAva varaNxdavaru yAva shivamUtiRyanunx ArAdhisuvudu utatxmaveMbudanunx tiLiya heVLidudu; umAsahitarAda maMDala deVvategaLoDane kUDiruva shivana pUjA parxkArada vivaraNe;

A maMDaladalilx parxtiSiThxtarAgiruva umAmaheVshavxrara pUjeya saMdaBaRdalilx shivanu adakekx takakx adhikAriyanunx tiLiya heVLidudu; aginx purANadalilx heVLiruva riVtiyalilx shivadiVkASx parxdAnakarxmada vivaraNe; sanatukxmAranige naMdikeVshavxranu heVLidudxdanunx sUtanu QuSigaLige heVLidudu; yoVgiyAdavaneV tatavxshudidhxyanunx paDeyutAtxne; jAcnxnadiMdaleV moVkaSx pArxpitxyu karxmavAgi doreyuvudu;

taMtarxshAsatxrXgaLalilx heVLiruva karxmadaMte shivadiVkASx vidhiyanunx vivarisiruvudu; shuBaniyamagaLanunx tiLiya heVLida meVle shivaspUjeya Palavanunx vivarisiruvudu; sadoyxVjAta, vAmadeVva, aGoVra, tatupxruSa, IshAna, eMba paMcabarxhamxsavxrUpa vivaraNeyanunx hiMde heVLidudxdanunx Iga viBAgaviveVcaneyiMda nirUpisiruvudu; paMcabarxhamxsavxrUpagaLa layakarxma vivaraNe; adhikAri vidhikarxmanirUpaNe;

adhikagarxMthaBAgada viSaya; shakitxpAtasavxrUpa; liMga saMsAkxragaLu; jalAdhivAsa, dhAnAyxdhivAsa, muMtAduvu; SaDadhavxgaLu-varANxdhavx, padAdhavx, maMtArxdhavx, kalAdhavx, tatAvxdhavx, BuvanAdhavxgaLu; mUvatetxMTutalegaLu; viVrasheYva diVkASxkarxma; liMgatarxya, tanutarxya, malatarxya, diVkASxtarxyagaLu; pANimaMtarx; SaTfsathxlagaLu; ELu liMgagaLu; aSATxMgayoVgadalilx ivugaLa samanavxya; acaRneyalilx pUjAupacAragaLu; oTuTx mUvatAtxru bagegaLu; karaliMgAcaRneya vivaragaLu; tiVthaRparxsAdagaLa sivxVkArada Pala; shivaliMgAcaRneya mahime; matutx PalagaLu; vijAcnxpane, samapaRNe;
shivAcaRneyalilx ahaRteyu sididhxsuvudakAkxgi BAsakxrana acaRne. namasAkxra, upAsanegaLanunx tiLisade; swrAGaRyxda karxma; bASakxla maMtarx;
shivAcaRneya karxma; maMdAdhikAriyu sathxMDiladalilx shivaliMgAcaRneyanunx mADabeVku. utatxmAdhikAriyu mAnasa pUjA, hoVmAdigaLanunx mADabahudu;
shivaniMda upadiSaTxvAda shivapUjA karxma; mudArx vidhAna; tatavxshudidhxyariVti; paMcabarxhamx maMtarxgaLa viniyoVga karxma; shivAcaRneya Pala;

shivAginx kArayxda vidhAna; asatxrX maMtarx, kavaca maMtarx, araNi, aginxkuMDada AkAra, pAtarx visheVSagaLu; hoVmada udedxVshAnusAravAda pAterxgaLu; shAMti pwSiTxka karamxgaLu; aginx jihAvx kalapxne; kuMDa saMsAkxra; mathitAginx saMsAkxra; pAtarx saMsAkxra; cakuSxhoRVma; aginxkArayx Pala;
aGoVrAcaRne; nAyxsavidhAnakarxma; maMtarxgaLa viniyoVga; dhAyxna; baliparxdAna; hoVmAdigaLu; akARdi aSaTx puSapxpUjA; sathxMDiladalilx pUjegiMta liMgadalilx pUje utatxma; naMdiya parxBAva;

jayABiSeVka; SoVDasha mahAdAnakarxma; savx (naq) patiya aBiSeVka; tadaMgavAgi navakuMDasAthxpana; AvaraNagaLalilx deVvatA visheVSagaLa pUjAkarxma; sahasarxkalashagaLa sAthxpaneyalilxna visheVSagaLu; deVviVgAyatitxrXV, shivagAyatitxrXV maMtarxgaLu; divxtiVyAvaraNadalilx eMTu, hadinAru, ipapxtutxnAlukx, shakitx deVvategaLa pUjAkarxma; shakitxpUjeyalilx vUyxhagaLu; aNimAdi aSaTxsididhx vUyxhagaLu; caMDa, caMDAvUyxha; hara, harAvUyxha; shwMDa, manamxtha, BiVma; shAkuna, sumati, goVpa, naMda, peYtAmaha, muMtAda ipapxtutxnAlukx vUyxhagaLu; matutx I shakitxvUyxhagaLu; bANaliMgakekx aBiSeVka, rAjanige aBiSeVka; AmeVle hoVma; parxteyxVkavAgi sahasArxvaqtitx hoVmagaLu; anaMtaradalilx rAjacihenxgaLa dhAraNe; aBiSeVka Pala;

manuvu rudArxdhAyxyadiMda shaMkarananunx sutxtisidanu; AmeVle meVru pavaRtadalilx sanatukxmArananunx noVDidanu; avana pUravx janamxda kathe; avana jiVvanumxkatx sithxtiyalABa; mukitxge jAcnxnaveV sAkASxtAkxraNa. karamx, jAcnxna karamxgaLa samucacxya, ivU citatxshudidhx, jAcnxna pArxpitx yoVgayxtA saMpAdanagaLa mUlaka paraMparA sAdhana; naMdiyu heVLidadx SoVDashamahAdAnagaLa vivaraNe; kuTiVra, veVdike, kuMDagaLa racane; tulABAra dAnakekx tulAracane; gAyatitxrXV maMtarx diMda parxdhAna hoVma, tulABAradAna;
hi ra Nayx ga Ba R dA na; catuviRMshatikAdeVviV dhAyxna; IshAnAdi maMtarxgaLa matutx gAyatitxrXV maMtarxda japa; hecicxna vivaragaLanunx aginxpurANadalilx tiLiyabeVku;
tilaparavxtadAnavidhi; sadoyxVjAta muMtAda paMcabarxhamx pUjA; kalashasAthxpana, pUjA; AmeVle dAna;
inonxMdu bageya atishayavAda tilaparavxta dAnakarxma; tilarAshiyalilx parameVshavxrananUnx, shakitxyanUnx pUjisi dAna mADuvudu;

SoVDadAnakarxmavanunx tiLisi Iga jiVvacACxrXdadhx karxmavanunx tiLiya heVLutAtxre; I karamxvanunx Acarisalu elalxrigU adhikAravirutatxde; shoVdhisida BUmiyalilx veVdike (sathxMDila) yanunx mADi, alilx kuMDavanunx racisi aginxyanunx parxtiSiThxsabeVku; aginx muKavanunx neraveVrisi, paqthivAyxdi paMcatatavxgaLanunx dhAyxnisutAtx samidodhxVmavanunx mADabeVku; paMcaviMshati deVvatA pUjA; tirxmUritxgaLige hoVma; rudarxhoVma; virajA maMtarxhoVma; shavARdi aSaTxdeVvatA\s \s vAhane mADiruva bArxhamxNarige ELaneya dinadalilx mahAdAnavanunx mADabeVku; jiVvacACxrXdadhxda PaLa;

rudarx, Aditayx, vasu, iMdArxdi deVvategaLa parxtiSAThxpaneya karxmada vivaraNe; sarasavxtiyu athavA AkAshavANiyu alilx pArxduBaRvisi sakala loVkagaLU liMgarUpagaLeMdu heVLi, liMga parxtiSAThx, pUjAdigaLanunx mADabeVkeMdu tiLisidudu;

A upadeVshadiMda iMdarx, barxhAmx, viSuNx, munigaLu muMtAdavarelalxrU, liMgarUpareMbudanunx managaMDaru; liMgamUtiRya racane, parxtiSAThxpanakarxma vivaraNe; shiva, pAvaRtiV, kalashagaLa sAthxpane; shiva, maheVshavxra, rudarx, viSuNx, pitAmaha, eMba I paMcabarxhamxranunx parxteyxVkavAgiyAgali, parxdhAnavAda shivakalashadalilxyeV Agali AvAhanemADabeVku; AyAdeVvatA parxtimegaLa sAthxpane; kalashoVdakagaLanunx maMtarxgaLiMda saMsakxrisi, adariMda liMgakekx aBiSeVkavanUnx, pUjA dhAyxnAdigaLanUnx neraveVrisi, parxtiSiThxsabeVku;

itara sakala deVvategaLa parxtiSAThxpanakarxma; paMcAginxsAthxpana athavA dAvxdashAginx sAthxpana karxmadiMda sUrayxsAthxpana; parxtiyoMdu deVvateya parxtiSAThxpaneyalilx upayoVgisabeVkAda gAyatirxV maMtarxda beVrebeVreya rUpagaLu; sithxraliMga, caraliMgagaLa acaRnAdikarxma; aSATxvaraNa deVvategaLu;
aGoVreVshana parxtiSAThxkarxma; A deVvana pUjAkarxma, matutx hoVmakarxma;

Ishavxranu aparadhigaLanunx nigarxhamADuvakarxma; adanunx yAru, yAvAga, elilx, yAra viSayadalilx upayoVgisabeVkeMba viSaya; A maMtarxda sididhxkarxma; hiVge shaturxnAshadalilx inonxMdu bageya upadeVsha;
vajarxvAhanikA videyxya savxrUpa, adara parxyoVga karxma; ideV vajerxVshavxriV videyxyu; I videyxya sahAyadiMda IshavxranU layavanunx mADutAtxne;

veVdavAkayxgaLalilx devxYtaparagaLeMdU, adevxYtaparagaLeMdU, eraDu bage; ivugaLige ApAtavAgi toVruva viroVdha; devxYtavu kalipxtavu; adevxYtaveV AdhAyxsi kavAgali enanxlgadu; devxYtavu pariNAmiyAgi anitayxvAgiruvudu elalxrigU gotAtxgutitxde; shUnayxvu adhiSAThxnavAgalAradu; devxYtavu parxtayxkaSx gamayx, savaRvidita; adevxYtavu shurxtimAtarxgamayx; atiVMdirxyagaLAda dhamaRsadagxtigaLalilx shurxtiyeV parxmANavAgiruvaMte, adevxYtadalUlx shurxtiyeV parxmANavAgirabalalxdu; veVdavu apwruSeVyavAdudu; doVSasaMbaMdhavilalxdudu; devxYtavAkayxgaLU adhAyxroVpa apavAda nAyxyavanunx anusarisi, adevxYtavanunx tiLisuvudaralilxyeV tAtapxyaRvuLaLxvu; yAvudu elalx kAlagaLalUlx irabalalxdoV adu abAdhayx nitayx; devxYtavu vikAri, anitayx; jagatutx BAvavU alalxvU, aBAvavU alalx, anivaRcaniVya, sadasadivxlakaSxNa; adhayxsatxvAdudara bAdhaveMdare adhiSAThxnamAtarx uLiyuvikeyAgide; elalx dashaRnagaLU veVdAthaRjAcnxnakekx aMgagaLu; jAcnxnakamaRgaLige PalaBeVda; matutx parxkaraNaBeVda; mImAMsakara samAdhAna; AkeSxVpakekx sharxvaNamanana nididhAyxsanagaLu dashaRna sAdhana;

AtamxjAcnxnavu savaRpArxyashicxtatxvAgiralu Atamxvasutxvina shudadhx savxrUpaveV kAraNavu; anAtamxdalilx doVSa, AtamxdoVSarahita; jaDadalilx doVSa, AtamxjeVtana rUpanu; vaqtitxjAcnxnadalilx doVSa, savxrUpajAcnxna doVSashUnayx; Atamxnu AnaMdarUpanu, parama perxVmAsapxdanu, doVSasaMpakaRrahitanu; anuBavada viBajane; suKavu viSayadadxlalxvu, iMdirxyadUdx alalxvu, manasisxnadU alalxvu, AdudariMda Atamxnu suKasavxrUpanu; avasAthxtarxyadalilx Atamxnige baruva oTuTx anuBavadiMda Aguva tiLIvaLIkeyu pUNaRvAdudu: suSupitxyiMda ecacsxrakekx hiMtiruguvudakekx mUlAvideyxyeV kAraNa; barxhamxtatavxdalilx ApeVkiSxkavAda saqSATxyXraMBadalilx uMTAguva sapxMda, mAyA, Adishakitx, parAshakitx, deVviV, avidAyx, kAma, kamaR, deYva dhamaR, ivelalxvU oMdeVtatavxda rUpAMtaragaLu; Atamxnu pAramAthiRkavAgi savxtaH shudadhxnu, AjAcnxnaveMba upAdhiya saMbaMdhadiMda ashudadhxnaMte toVrutAtxne, AdudariMda saMbaMdhadiMda ashudadhxnaMte toVrutAtxne, AdudariMda AtamxjAcnxnadiMdaleV utatxmashudidhxyu, ashudidhxyu vAyxvahArikavAdudu; parashivadhAyxna, pArxNAyAma, samAdhi ivugaLiMda shudidxyAgutatxde; jaDavasutxgaLige shudidhxparxkAragaLu, maqNamxyagaLu, dhAnayxgaLu, vasatxrXgaLu, loVhapAterxgaLu ivugaLa shudidhxkarxmagaLu; deVvoVtasxvadalilx sapxqSiTxdoVSavilalxvu; nitayxshudadhx barxhamxciMtanavu shudidhxkaravu; elalxvanUnx parameVshavxra savxrUpavAdudeMdu anuBavadiMda BAvisuvudeV utatxmavAda shudidhxparxkAravu;
