elalxrigU idu anuBavakekx barutitxruvudu; cicapxkitx savxrUpaLAda tirxpurAdeVviyeV tAyiyu; Atamx savxrUpada ariviniMda A tAyiya dashaRnavAgutatxde. AtamxtatamxvU tirxpurAtatavxvU oMdeV Agide; jAcnxniyAda guruvina anugarxhadiMda A anuBavavu baruvudu; nananxdu eMba BAvavu hoVgi nAnu eMba BAvavu barabeVku: heVmacUDanu AtomxVpAsane mADidudu; deVha, pArxNa, manasusx, budidhxgaLu nananxvu, nAnalalx eMdare AtamxsavxrUpavalalx; nAnu iruva nishacxyavu ecacxra kanasu niderxgaLalilx anusUyxtavAgide; daqshayxgaLanunx biTuTx daqkf AtamxveMdu tiLidudu; vaqtitxsAmAnayxvanUnx viroVdisi AtamxjoyxVtiya dashaRna; parxkAsha, AnaMda, katatxlegaLa dashaRna; heVmaleVKeyanunx avanu kareyisidanu; AtamxvicAradiMda aMdhakAra, parxkAsha, suKagaLa anuBava; A samAdhiyu sithxravAdare katatxle, beLakugaLanunx dATi ceYtanAyxnaMdada aparoVkASxnuBavavV AtamxsavxrUpavAdudu; adeV tirxpurA parAshakitx savxrUpavu; adu apArxpatxpArxpitxyalalx; manoVniroVdhadiMda itara anuBavagaLu tapipx, sheVSaBAvadiMda AtamxdashaRna; aKaMDa ceYtanayxda aparoVkaSxvu vaqtitxrUpavalalx; vaqtitxyanunx miVrida cidUrxpa; adu AkAshadaMtide; ecacxra kanasugaLa anuBavagaLalilx jagatitxna parxkAshakekx adhiSAThxnavAda sAmAnayx ceYtanayxvU toVrutitxde; adanunx aMtarumxKa daqSiTxyiMda tiLiyabeVku; nirivxkalapx samAdhiyalilx heVmacUDanu Atamxtatavxdalilx shAMti suKavanunx anuBavadiMda tiLidanu;

heVmaLeVkeyu idanunx managaMDaLu; samAdhiyanunx paDeyuvudu, AmeVle kaNuNx mucicxdAgaleV Atamx savxrUpavanunx anuBavisuvudu, idanunx miVri yAvAgalU heVgidadxrU akaMDa sacicxdAnaMda rUpanAda Atamxnanunx managANutitxruvaMtAguvudu paramapadaviyu, jiVvanumxkitxyu, eMdu upadeVshisidaLu; jagatitxnalilxyeV, itara anuBavagaLAgutitxruvAgalU, AkAshadaMte elalxkUkx adhiSAThxnavAgiruva ceYtanayxvanunx AvicipxnanxvAgi, aMtarumxKavAgiruvAga heVgoV hAge bahimuRKavAgiruvAgalU, aKaMDa sAmAnayx ceYtanayxvanunx anuBavisuvudu parama padaviyu; I savxrUpajAcnxnavilalxdiruvikeyeV moVhaveMba hagagxvu; idariMdaleV deVhAdigaLalilx Atamxbudidhxyu gaMTAgiruvudu; hiVgeyeV jiVveVshavxra BeVdavU, jiVva jiVva BeVdavU AtamxsavxrUpada ajAcnxnadiMda uMTAgide; kAla deVshagaLu kananxDiyaMte shUnayxgaLu; kaNuNx mucicxyeV AtamxdashaRnavAguvaMtidadxre paramapadaviyanunx paDedaMtAguvudilalx; idanUnx heVmacUDanu dhAyxnadiMda managaMDanu; hiVGe jiVvanumxkatx sithxtiyanunx paDeda heVmacUDananunx noVDi, taMdeyAda mukAtxcUDanU, tamamxnAda maNicUDanU, AmeVle maMtirxgaLU, itara parxjegaLu gaMDasarU, heMgusarU, elalxrU karxmavAgi AtamxjAcnxnigaLAdaru; varxvahAragaLelalxvU veVdAMtada tiLIvaLiyiMdaleV nereveVrutitxtutx! adariMda A paTaTxNakekx vidAyxnagaraveMdu hesarAyitu; sherxVyoVlABakekx satasxMgaveV mUla kAraNavu.

daqshayxvAda jagatutx ceVtana mAtarx savxrUpavAgiruvudeMbudu heVge? eMdu parashurAmana parxshenx; jagatutx kArayxrUpavAdudu; kAraNavu paramANugaLeMdu tAkiRkaravAdavu, asatAkxrayxvAdavu anuBava yukitxgaLige virudadhxvAdudu; kAraNavu upalabadhxvAgalu anahaRvAgiralu, anumAnavU parxtayxkaSxvanenxV anusarisiralu, kArayxkAraNaBAvaveV asidadhxvAgutatxde; jagatitxna kataqRvu pURaNxnU, saravx vAyxpitxyU, saravxjacnxnU AgirabeVku; avanu parxpaMcadiMda horagidudx saqSiTxsutAtxneyeV? oLagidedxV saqjisuvaneV? paramAtamxnigU I carAcaraparxpaMcavu shariVravenanxbeVku; jiVvAtamxnige deVheVMdirxyagaLu heVge savxrUpavalalxvoV hAge parxpaMcavu paramAtamxnige savxrUpavalalxvu; kananxDiyalilx heVgoV hAge paramAtamxnalilx jagatutx parxkAshitavAgutatxde; yoVgiya saMkalapxdaMte toVrutatxde; Atamxnu savxparxkAshanu, pUNaRnu, nimaRlanu; AdudariMda jagatutx asatayxvAdudu; sheYlaloVka saqSiTxyu yoVgasididhxya Pala;

I jagatutx, asatayxvAdarU satayxvAgiruvaMte Eke toVrutitxde? AtamxsavxrUpada ajAcnxnaveV idakekx kAraNavu; suSeVNana kathe, yajAcnxshavxvanunx jayashiVlarAgi hiMbAlisutitxdadx rAjakumAranu taMgaNa QuSige gwravavanunx salilxsalilalx; taMgaNaputarxxnu avaranunx keYsere hiDidu sheYlaloVkadoLagiTaTxnu; mahAseVnanu baMdu vinayadimda avana anugarxhavanunx paDedudu; taMgaNana pUvaRkathe; yoVga samAdhiya mahime; sheYlaloVkvaloVkana;

anuBavagaLa vAsane athavA saMsAkxragaLiMda kUDida sUkaSxmX athavA liMgadeVhavu shariVrakekx seVrisalapxTaTx meVle ecacxtatx mahAseVnanu I loVkavanunx hosadAgiruvaMte noVDi duHKisutitxdadx; mahAseVnananunx munikumAranu saMteYsidudu; sheYlaloVkadalilxna kAlaparimANavu beVreya bageyadu eMdare deVva mAnadaMte adakikxMtalU tuMba hecicxna parxmANadalilxrutatxde; A kAladalilx I loVkadalilx bahaLa badalAvaNegaLAgive; janana maraNagaLu sAvxBAvika matutx anivArayx; anitayxvAda, savxpanx, iMdarxjAlagaLaMtiruva avakAkxgi ciMtisabAradu; nitayxvAda Atamxtatavxvanunx sAkASxtakxrisabeVku; avasAthxtarxya vimasheRyiMda Atamxnitayxtavxvanunx managANabeVku; jAgarxtetxMba citarxkekx Atamxnu kananxDiyaMtiruvanu;

samAdhAnagoMDa mahAseVnana parxshenx; EkakAladalilx deVshakAlagaLu BinanxvAgi sAguvudu heVge; BAvaneyiMda parxpaMcavayxvahAravu; sidadxBAvane, asidadhx BAvane; sheYlaloVkasaqSiTxyu sidadhxBAvaneya Pala; bAsayxvelalxvU BAsakadoLageV irutatxde; ceYtanayxvu savaRBAsakavu; AdarU kananxDiyaMte niviRkAravAgirutatxde; avayxkatx, avidAyx, jaDashakitx, sadAshiva, Ishavxra, shudadhxvidAyx, paMcakaMcuka, parxkaqti, citatx, puruSa, tirxpurAshakitx, hiraNayxgaBaR; BeVdaauSAdhika; BAvanAsidadhxvAda BArxMtitAyxgaveV moVkaSx;

adivxtiVyajAcnxna oMdeV satayx; parxpaMcavu sAvxtamxBititxyalilx mAyAshakitxya sAvxtaMtarxyXdiMda toVrutitxde; Adare jAcnxnavu viSayavilalxde heVge irabalalxru? jAcnxnigaLa sithxtiyalUlx BeVdavu Eke ide? elalxra sAdhanaPalagaLalilx taratamaBAvaveVke? janakana kathe, tirxpurABakitx; varuNana yAga, varuNaputarxnu janakana sadasayxranunx dUSisidudu; vitaMDA, jalapx, karxmadalilx aSATxvakarxniMda parABava; tApasiyiMda aSATxvakarxnige upadeVsha; Atamxtatavxvu savxparxkAsha tatavxvu; kaMThacAmIkaranAyxya; tirxpurAtatavxveVcicaPxkitxyu; aMtadaRshanadiMda kANabeVku;

tApasiyu aMtadhARnavanunx hoMdidameVle janakanu aSATxvakarxnige vivarisida bage; EkavijAcnxnadiMda savaRvijAcnxna; veVdarxvelalxvU jaDa; kananxDige savxcaCxte oMdeV savxrUpavu; sithxravalalxdadxrimda shariVrAdigaLu Atamxvalalxvu; ahaMBAvada sUPxtiRyu sAvaRjaniVna, savARMtara matutx savxparxkAsha; shudadhxmanasisxniMda tiLiyabeVku; nidArxdhiVnavAda manasusx cidavxsutxvanunx tiLisalAradu: elalxvU mAyeyeMdalalx, elalxvU shivaneMdu tiLiyuvudu shudadhxvideyxyu; elalxvU shivaneMdu tiLiyuvudu shudadhxvideyxyu; vaqtitxrahitasithxtige samAdhi eMdu hesaru; saSupitxyu nivaqRtitxyAdarU jaDasithxtiyu;

vayxvahAradesheyalUlx sUkaSxmXsamAdhigaLuMTu; nirivxkalamx samAdhi; aBAyxsAtishayadiMda aparoVkaSx sAkASxtAkxra; soVhaM eMba parxtayxBijAcnxsamAdhi; sharxvaNa, manana, nididhAyxsanagaLiMDa parxtayxgAtamxdhAyxnadalilx paripAkadiMda sididhxlABa; samxqti, parxtayxBijecnxgaLa BeVda; kataRvayxsheVSaviduvavaregU sididhx ilalxvu; tirxpuTiya BAnavU aLidare sididhxyu; ideV veVdayxtavxvilalxda jAcnxnada upalavidhxyu; idaralilx arivigiMta beVreyAda viSayaveV ilalxvu

mAyeyiMda savxsavxrUpAjAcnxnakekx aDiDxyu; shAsatxrXsArada nirUpaNe; shudadhx citf oMdeV nAnA bageyAgi toVrutatxde; athaRkirxyAkArigAdarU jAgatavasutxvu asatayxvu heVge? caMcalavAda citetxV manasusx, nishacxlavAda citutx Atamxl iveV karxmavAgi baMdhamoVkaSxgaLu; savxpanxdaMte ecacxravU mithAyx; satAyxsatayx savxrUpa; jAcnxnigaLalilx utatxma, madhayxma adhama, BedagaLu; budidhxBeVdadiMda, jAcnxnapAka BevdadiMda, pArxrabadhxkaramxPalaBeVdadiMda, vayxvahArada veYcitarxyXvu;

jiVvanumxkatxra vayxvahAravu heVgirutatxdeMdu punaH vivaraNegAgi parxshenx; jAcnxnavu oMdeVbageyAgiruvudariMda adaralilx pAkaBeVdavu heVge? sAdhana tAratamayxdiMda PalapArxpitxyalilx BeVda; budidhxge AvaraNavu vAsaneyiMda, aparAdha, kAma, karamxgaLiMda veYvidhayxvu; vAsanA nivaqtitxparxkAra; satasxMgAdi mUraralilx muKayxvAvudu? satasxMgadiMda moVkaSxpArxpitx; utakxqSaTx puNayxtAratamayxdiMda vasiSaThx janakAdigaLa BinanxsithxtigaLu; karamxvAsanA savxlapxvidadxrU jAcnxnoVdayavAgadu; amanasakxnigiMta uatatxma madhayxma yoVgigaLa veyshiSaTxyX; maMdajAcnxniyu samanasakxnu; utatxma jAcnxnige vayxvahAra kAladalUlx samAdhiyuMTu;

barxhamxna saBeyalilx jAcnxnada parxsaMgavu naDeyalu, sanakAdigaLu kelavaru karamxniSaThxrU matetx kelavaru BakitxniSaThxrU AgiruvudeVkeMdu parxshenx mADidaru; sanAmxgaRnishacxyakAkxgi barxhAmx, viSuNx, rudarxru tirxpurAdhane mADidudu; tirxpurAdeVviyu tananx para matutx apararUpagaLanunx vivarisidaLu; avara aishavxrayxvU apariciCxnanxvu; adevxYta nirUpaNe, ajAcnxnanAsha; moVkaSxsavxrUpadalilx shaMkA samAdhAna; budidhxyalilx mAlinayxda tAratamayxdiMda kAla tAratamayx; sAdhakana yoVgayxtAnusAravAgi sididhx pArxpitx; pApanAshaka vidAyxgiVte;

jAcnxnasAdhana, jAcnxnilakaSxNa; deVvAtAnugarxhadiMda jAcnxnalABa; jAcnxnigaLige deVhasaMyoVga viyoVgagLalilx sithxtiBeVdaviradu; budidhxya paripAka tAratamayxdiMda jAcnxnigaLalilx utatxma, madhayxma, adhama, BeVda; rukAmxMgada heVmAMgadara kathe; koMlada daDadalilx barxhamxrAkaSxsanoDane saMvAda; parxshonxVtatxragaLu; heVmAMgadana utatxradiMda parAjitanAda barxhamxrAkaSxsanu muMcinaMte bArxhamxNanAdudu;

shApamukatxnAda A vasumaMtaneMba bArxhamxNanu aSaTxka muniyiMda tiLididadx Atamxtatavxvanunx heVmAMgadaniMda canAnxgi tiLidu, jAcnxniyAda heVmAMgadanige beVTe muMtAda vayxvahAradalilx parxvaqtitx heVgeMdu keVLidanu; jAcnxnakekx vayxvahAradiMda bAdhe taTaTxdu; nirivxkalapxjAcnxna vAsatxva; savikalapxtavxvu BArxMtimUlakavu; barxmABarxma viveVcane; jAcnxnigaLalilx utatxma, madhayxma, maMdaru; karamxBeVdadiMda vAsanABeVda; datatxguruvu shAsatxrXsAravanunx punaH heVLidudu; I vijAcnxnadiMda moVha nirAsavAgutetxMdu nAradanige hAriVtAyanana vivaraNe; Palashurxti;

maMgaLAcaraNe; barxhamxtatavxsavxrUpdalilx shivatatavxshakitxtatavxgaLa savxrUpa; tirxpurAdeVviya savxrUpa, BarataKaMDada dakiSxNadikikxnalilx malayapavaRta vanaRneyu; alilx giri, nadiV, saroVvara, giDa, mara, baLiLx, maqga, pakiSx, Barxmara muMtAdavugaLa vaNaRne; ElA, lavaMga, shirxVgaMdha muMtAdavugaLa beLe; sidadhx, gaMdhavaRra vihAra; tapasivxgaLa AsharxmagaLu; alilx parashurAmana tapoVvana; sumeVdhaneMba shiSayxnu guruvAda parashurAmananunx kuritu mADida nitAyxnaMdapArxpitxyu EtariMda AgutatxdeMdu parxshenx; datAtxterxVyana samxraNe; tirxpurAtatavxvivaraNe; upAsanegAgi sumeVdhanige diVkASxmaMtorxVpadeVsha; sumeVdhanu BArxmariVdeVviya vAsasAthxnavAda shirxVsheYladalilx tapasasxnunx mADuvudu; savxpanxdalilx bAlAMbikA dashaRna; sumeVdhakaqta deVviVmahimanxsotxVtarx; varapArxpitx; ecacxtatxmeVle AkAshavANiyiMdalU perxVritanAgi guruvanunx paDedu hirxV vidAyxdiVkeSxyanunx paDedudu; sumeVdhaneV hAriVtAyananu; guruvina apapxNeyaMte shiSayxnu deVviVmAhatemxyXyanunx racisalu AloVcisidudu; A meVle sumeVdhanu hAlAsayxkeSxVtarxdalilx shirxVmInAkiSxVdeVviya ArAdhane, maMtarx japagaLanunx neraveVrisidudu; nArada mahaDiRya dashaRna; samAdhiyalilx avana dashaRnavu Adudu heVgeMdu parxshinxsalu nAradana utatxra;

dashaRnaveMdareVnu? parxtayxkaSxvAguva bage; oLage horage eMba viveVcane; noVDuvudu elilx? noVDuvavanu yAru? iMdirxyagaLiMda dashaRnavAdare darxSaTxqvge AdudeVnu? daqkfdaqSayxgaLa parimANagaLu; nAradanu barxhamxloVkadiMda baMdeneMdudu; alilx mAkaRMDeVyanu barxhamxnanunx kuritu sakala shurxtisamxqtisAravanunx tiLiyaheVLeMdu parxshinxsidudu; adarimda barxhamxnige parAMbAsamxqtiyuMTAdudu; barxhamxkaqta tirxpurAdeVviVsutxti; A tirxpurAdeVviyeV savoRVtatxmavAda savaRkAraNavAda tatavxvu; I rahasayxvanunx shivanu viSuNxvigU, viSuNxvu nAradanigU heVLidudu; BUloVkadalilx mahAviSuNxrUpiyAda datAtxterxVyanu BAgaRvaparashurAmanigU, parashurAmanu sumeVdhamahaSiRgU A tirxpurArahasayxvanunx upadeVshisidudu; A sumeVdhanu adanunx garxMtharUpadalilx racisalu yoVcisutAtx hAlAsayxkeSxVtarxkekx baMdirutAtxneMdu barxhamxnu heVLalu, A ninanxnunx noVDalu nAnu ililxge baMdeneMdu heVLidudu; niVnu managaMDiruva tatavxda savxrUpavanunx heVLeMdu nAradanu sumeVdhananunx keVLidudu; sumeVdhanu tanage cenAnxgi tiLiyadeMdU, guruvina ajAcnxnu sAravAgi garxMtharavanegAgi udedxVshapaTiTxruvudAgiyU heVLidadxlalxde, maMdabudidhxyAdudariMda gurUpa deVshavanunx maretiruvudAgi heVLi, A tatavxvanunx tiLiyaheVLalu nAradananunx pArxthiRsidudu; AmeVle nAradanu barxhamxdeVvananunx dhAyxnisi AvAhisidudu; teVjoVrAshiyAda barxhamxna AviBARva; sumeVdhanAradara pUje; sumeVdhanu tirxpurArahasAyx cArayxtavxvanunx heVge paDedaneMdu nAradana parxshenxge utatxravAgi barxhamxnu heVLida utatxra; pUvaRkAladalilx sumaMtuvina maganAda alakaRneMba divxjanu sarasavxtiVnadiya daDadalilx BataqRparAyaNaLAda heMDatiyoDane vAsavAgidudxdu; sumeVdhanu avara maganu; taMdeyu tAyiyanunx ``ayi'' eMdu saMboVdhisidadxnunx keVLi, aidu vaSaRda bAlakanAgidadx ivanu ai, ai, eMdu heVLutAtx tAyiyanunx dhAyxnisutitxdadxnu. pUvaRkamaRPalavAgi roVgAratxnAda A bAlakanu hAge tAyiyanunx dhAyxnisutitxruvAgaleV maqtanAdudu; hiVge biMdu rahitavAda vAgaBxvabiVjAkaSxrada japadiMda tuSaTxLAda shirxVbAlAdeVviyu parxsananxLAdarU ajAcnxnapUvaRka japadimda ivanige dhAraNasAmathayxRvilalxde marevu uMTAyitu; Iga nananx anugarxhadiMda ivanu ukatxvAda matutx anukatxvAda elalx viSayagaLanUnx tiLidu heVLabalalxvanAgirutAtxne; tirxpurArahasayx garxMthavanUnx racisutAtxne; eMdu heVli, nAradanoDane aMtadhARnavAdudu; sumeVdhanu veVgavatiyalilx sAnxnamADi suMdareVsha, mUnAkiSxV, guru, gaNeVsharanunx ArAdhisi garxMthavanunx OM namaH emdu pArxraMBisi, tirxpureYvahirxVM, eMdu kaDeyalilx mugisidudu; hiVge shivashakitxparxNavagaLa madheyx iruva tirxpurArahasayx shivashakitxtatavxgaLanunx tiLisutatxde;

maMgalAcaraNa, nAradAgamana, sumeVdhanAradara saMvAdarUpadalilx tirxpurArahasayxvanunx heVLidudu; catumuRKabarxhamxna maganu Baqguvu, avana maganu cayxvananu, sukaneyxyu avana heMDitiyu, avara maganu QuciVkanu, gAdhiya magaLu avana hemDitiyu, QuciVkanu tuSaTxnAgi bArxhamxNanAda maganU, kaSxtirxyanAda tamamxnU uMTAguvaMte eraDu caruvanunx koTaTxnu; gAdhipatinxyu caruvanunx badalAisidaLu; vaMcitaLAda magaLu pArxthiRsida meVle bArxhamxNanAda maganU, kaSxtirxyanAda momamxganU AguvudAgi anugarxhisidanu. gAdhiputarxnu vishAvxmitarxmuniyu; QuciVkaputarxnu jamadaginxyu, avana maganu parashurAmanu; avanu kaaSxtirxyaranunx nAshamADidudu; rAmananUnx edurisi, tananx veYSaNxvadhanusasxnunx hedeErisalu koTaTxnu; rAmanu hAge mADi bANakekx guriyanunx keVLalu, parashurAmanu ajiRsidadx puNayx loVkagaLanunx toVridanu; avanunx saMharisi bANavu shAMtavAgalu BAgaRvarAmanu lajijxtanAgi shAMtiyanunx paDedu hiMtirugidanu;

BAgaRvarAmanu dAriyalilx korxVdhada duSapxriNAmagaLanunx managANutAtx dAriyalilx teVjasivxyAgi malinanAgiruva puruSananunx noVDidanu; Atanu mahApuruSanirabeVkeMdu vicArisalu avanu kalulxgaLanunx biVrutAtx ODahatitxdanu avananunx hiDidu dUSisidarU, mAnAvamAnagaLalilx samanAgidadx avana mahimeyanunx gurutisi anugarxha pArxthaRne mADidanu; parxsananxvAgi avanu niVnu yAru? eMba parxshenxyalilx tavxM padAthaRsavxrUpavanunx vivarisalu adanunx tiLiyalArade canAnxgi vivariseMdu keVLidanu. Aga avanu tananx paricayavanunx tiLisalu tAnu aMgiVrasagoVtorxVtapxnanxnAda saMvataReMdU guruvAda tananx aNaNxnoDane kAraNAMtaradiMda veYravu uMTAgalu adariMda veYrAgayxvuMTAgi liMgA sharxmagaLanunx mIriruva I sithxtiyanunx paDedu, datAtxterxVya guruviniMda upadeVshAnugarxhavu doreyiteMdu heVLidanu. satasxhavAsadiMda sadugxruvina parxsAdadiMda tirxpurAmaheVshavxriVdeVviya ArAdhaneyalilx adara uMTAgi A deVviya ArAdhaneyiMda saMsAramAgaRvanunx dATi AtamxjAcnxnavanunx paDyuvudu sulaBaeMdU beVre yAva mAgaRvU sulaBavalalxveMdU tiLiyaheVLi saMvataRnu horaTu hoVdanu. adaraMte parashurAmanU datatxguruvina samiVpakekx teraLidanu;

AmeVle BAgaRvarAManu utatxrABimuKanAgi datatx guruvina Asharxmakekx talapalu horaTu dAAriyalilx I lwkika varxvahAravu heVge ajAcnxnamUlakavAdudeMbudanunx vimashiRsi managANutAtx muMduvaridanu; janaru suJAthiRgaLAgi deVhAtamxbuddhx eMba BArxMtiyalilx naraLutAtx, kAmapUtiRyAgi anucita mAgaRdalUlx dhanaJaRnemADutAtxre. nAcike ilalx davarAgirutAtxre. savARnathaRmUlavAda kAmavanunx biTuTx AbyavAda AtamxjAncxnada padaviyanunx pDeyalu nAnu datatxguruvanunx samiVpisuveneMdu nishacxyisidanu; deVvadalilx doVSavimasheR; kAma korxVdavasharAdaru idanunx gamanisu; dhanavu Atamxmaqtuyxsama; EkeMdare dhanavaMtana maraNavanunx baMdhugaLeV AshisutAtxre; gaMdhamAdana pavaRtadalilx datAtxterxVyana Asharxmavanunx paDedanu; shiSayxna mUlaka datatxguruvanunx kaMDu namasakxrisidanu.

viniVtanAgi niMtidadx BAgaRvananunx kuritu datAtxterxVyanu kushalaparxshenxgaLanunx mADidudu; ninanx tapashavxyeRyu niviRSanxvAgideyeV? AkaSaRkavasutxgaLalilx rasanoVpasathxgaLeraDU atayxMta balavulaLxvu; nAnu avanunx seVvisutitxdeVne; AdudariMda aneVkaru biTuTxhoVdaru. niVnu Eke baMde? nijavAdudanunx dheYyaRvAgi heVLu eMdanu. rAmanu vinayadoDane hiVge heVlidanu. guruveV tananxnunx shakisabeVDa, saMsAraduHKadimda virakatxnAgideVne. guruvu sadAcAravaMtanAgirali durAcAriyAgirali avanu shivasavxrUpaneMdu naMbi baMdideVne. ATamxjAcnxnavanunx anugarxhisuvavaneV guruvu. elalx viSayagaLanUnx anuBavisutitxruva mAnavarU deVvategaLu duHKigaLeV AgidAreMdu managaMDideVne. nananxnunx kApADu eMdanu. guruvu iMtaha manoVvaqtitxyu tirxpurA deVviya anugarxhavilalxde uMTAgadeMdu heVLi deVviyalilx sharxdedhxyu daqDhavAgalu, A tAyiya mahimeyanunx keVLabeVkeMdanu;

guruvina mAtiniMda saMtuSaTxnAda BAgaRvanu tirxpurA deVviya tatavxvanunx tiLiyaheVLabeVkeMdu keVLikoMDanu; guruvu tirxpurAtatavxvanunx tiLiyuvudu barxhAmx viSunx, rudarx muMtAda doDaDxvarigU sulaBavAgilalx; shurxtAyxdiparxmANagaLU neVravAgi tiLiyisalAravu; parxtiyobabxrU `asimx' eMba anuBavamAtarxdiMda, cicaCxkitxsavxrUpavanunx sAkASxtakxrisuvudariMda mAtarx tiLiyabeVkAgide: aMtaha jAcnxnakekx sahAyavAguva katheyoMdanunx hevLutetxVne; pUvaRkAladalilx imdarx, aginx, soVma, vAyu, muMtAda deVva parxmuKaralilxyeV parasapxravAgi, ``nAnu hecucx, tAnu hecucx'' eMdu jagaLavAyitu. avaru niNaRyakAkxgi barxhamxnalilxge hoVdaru. avanU adanunx gotutxmADi heVLlArade, avaroDane viSuNxvina samiVpakekx niNaRyakAkxgiyU shAMtilABakAkxgiyU hoVgi vijAcnxpisidanu. Aga viSuNxvU sadAshivananunx dhAyxnisalu avanu parxtayxkaSxnAdanu; viSayavanunx tiLidu A mahAdeVvanU tirxpurA maheVshavxriyanunx elalxroDane dhAyxnamADidanu. kAraNa puruSarAda tirxmUtiRgaLiMdalU dhAyxnisalapxTaTx deVviyu parxtayxkaSxLAdaLu. A parAMbikeyanunx noVDi elalxrU sotxVtarxmADidaru;

barxhamxkaqtadeVviVsotxVtarx; viSuNxkaqtatirxpurAsotxVtarx; shivakaqta tirxpurAmaheVshavxriVsutxti; Aga deVviyu rAgadevxVSagaLige adhiVnarAgi jagaLavADida deVvategaLa gavaRBaMgavanunx mADi paratatavxda savxrUpavanunx anuBavakekx taMdukoDuvudara mUlaka anugarxha mADalu baMdiruvudAgi tirxmUtiRgaLige heVLi, deVviya teVjasisxniMda mUCiRtarAgidadx deVvategaLanunx ecacxragoLuLxvaMte anugarxhisidaLu; avaru edudx A vayxkitxyanunx tiLiyalu tamamx muKaMDaralilx obabxnAda aginxyanunx kaLuhisidaru; avanu tananx parAkarxmavanunx tiLisalu, deVviyu oMdu hululx kaDidxyaninxTuTx adanunx suDu. eMdaLu; aginxyu asamathaRnAgi hiMtirugidanu; AmeVle caMdarxnU, vAyuvU hoVgi tiLIyalArade hiMtirugidaru; aga iMdarxnu AshacxrayxBayagaLiMda yoVcisutitxdadxnu;

iMdarxnU tananx parAkarxmadalilx naMbikeyiMda hoVgi deVviyanunx kuritu, aginx muMtAdavaraMteyeV, niVnu yAreMdu keVLalu, avaLu ninanx savxrUpa shakitxgaLanunx modalu tiLisenanxlu, rAgadevxVSAhaMkAragaLiMda paravashanAgidadx iMdarxnU deVviyanunx vajArxyudhadiMda parxharisalu hoVgalu, avana shakitxyu kuMdi alugADadaMtAdanu, Aga gavaRBaMgavAgi ecacxatx avanu AMgirasagoVtorxVtapxnanxnAda baqhasapxtiyanunx dhAyxnisalu avanu parxtayxkaSxnAdanu; elalx viSayagaLanUnx iMdarxnu vijAcnxpisalu, guruvu iMdarxna yoVgakeSxVmasAdhanegAgi tirxpurAmaheVshavxriV deVviyanunx sotxVtarxmADidanu; baqhasapxtikaqta deVviVsotxVtarxda riVti; adariMda saMtoVSagoMDa deVviyu anugarxhisalu, iMdarxna ahjAcnxna ahaMkAragaLu naSaTxvAgalu, lajijxtanU viniVtanU Agi deVviyanunx ostxVtarxmADidanu. adariMda tuSaTxLAda deVviyu budidhxvAdavanunx heVLi, elalxra sAthxnamAnagaLanunx tiLisidaLu. barxhAmxdigaLu Bakitxya pArxthaRne mADalu, deVviyu hAgeyeV AgaleMdu anugarxhisi aMtadhARnavanunx hoMdidaLu. anaMtaradalilx viSuNxvu deVviVshakitx tatavxda savxrUpavanunx iMdArxdigaLige vivarisidanu. AmeVle karxmavAgi shivanU, viSuNxvU, barxhamxnU, deVvategaLU tamamx nivAsagaLanunx kuritu teraLidaru;

hiVge tirxpurasuMdariVdeVviyu kumAriV savxrUpadiMda baMdu anugarxhisida riVtiyanunx keVLi BAgaRva rAmanu datAtxterxVyaguruviniMda A deVviya mahimeyanunx vivarisiruva kathegaLanunx keVLabayasi pArxthiRsidanu. A deVviya muKayx rUpagaLu kumAriV, tirxrupA, gwriV, ramA, BAratiV, kALiV, caMDikA, dugAR, BagavatiV, kAtAyxyaniV, lalitA, eMdu parxsidadhxvAgide. saqSiTxkarxma varaNxne; rAmana parxshenxge utatxravAgi kaTakArana kathAvaraNxne; anavasaradalilx meVlina tatavxvanunx heVLabAradu; barxhamxnu I jagatitxna saqSiTxyalUlx, viSuNxvu pAlaneyalUlx, rudarxnu upasaMhAradalUlx I kArayxgaLalilx deVviyiMda niyoVjanemADalapxTaTxru; maqtuyxvu saMhAra kArayxvu beVDaveMdu atatxnu; adariMda roVgagaLuMTAgi maraNavu saMBavisuvaMtAyitu; tirxmUritxgaLa sahAyakAkxgi vANIV, ramA, rudArxNiV deVviyaranunx deVviyu koTaTxLu; idu deVviya tirxrUpavu

jagadevxYvitarxykekx pArxNigaLa kamaRBeVdavu kAraNavAguvaMtAdudu; pArxNigaLu deVvategaLige adhiVnarAdudu; iMdArxdigaLu guruvina salaheyaMte barxhamxloVkakekx hoVdaru; horagina saBe; kAmakorxVdhAdigaLanunx jayisiruvavarige mAtarx barxhamxna oLagina saBegU parxveVsha; deVvategaLiMda mAnavarige parxyoVjanavAguvudAdare avaru adhiVnarAgirutAtxre; kAmavu kAraNaveMbudu gotAtxgide. lakiSxmXV pArxthaRneyanunx mADalu deVvategaLu pArxraMBisidaru;

avara pArxthaRneyanunx maninxsi lakiSxmXyu tananx ArAdhaneya karxmavanunx upadeVshisidaLu; AdarU mAnavaralilx obibxbabxru mAtarx lakiSxmXya ArAdhaneyalilx toDagidadxru; punaH guruvina salaheyaMte lakiSxmXyanunx sutxtisalu, avara kArayxsAdhanegAgi eMdare mAnavaru pashuvinaMte deVvategaLige adhiVnarAgiruvaMte mADalu, aiduvaSaR vayasisxna kAmananunx tananx manasisxniMdaleV saqjisi kaLuhisikoTaTxLu; mAnavaru kAmanAvisheVSagaLige oLagAgi deVvategaLanunxdedxVshisi karamxgaLanunx mADuvaMteyU adariMda avaru deVvAdhiVarAguvaMteyU mADalu opipxdanu;

kAmanu EkAkiyAgiyeV BUloVkakekx baMdu janaranunx kuritu deVvAdhiVnarAguvaMte apapxNemADidanu; avaru utatxravAgi savxgaRdalilx deVvategaLu heVge iMdArxdhiVnaroV, hAge ililx nAvu namamx dorege adhiVnaru; nAvu deVvategaLanunx Eke pUjisabeVku? namamx doreyu barxhAmxvaratx deVshadalilix viVravarxtaneMdu parxsidadhxnAgidAne eMdaru. kAmanu avaranunx hoDedu saMharisutitxralu, cAraru dorege tiLisidaru. maMtirxyAda vadhaRnanu saBeyalilx vmashiRsi, sAmAdi upAyagaLige adu takakx samayavalalxveMdU, shivananunx ArAdhisabeVkeMdU heVLalu adaraMte mahAdeVvana anugarxhakAkxgi sidadhxtegaLanunx mADidaru;

rAjanu Iashavxrananunx kuritu tapasusxmADi parxtayxkaSxnAda shivananunx sutxtisidanu; viVravarxtakaqta shivasotxVtarx; shivananunx kuritu viVravarxtarAjanu virakitxmukitxgaLanunx, pArxthiRsidudu; shivanu avana muMcina kAmayxtapasisxna PalavAgi kAmananunx yudadhxdalilx gedudx, dhamaR rAjayxvanunx sAthxpisi, kaDege shivaloVkavanunx paDeyabeVkenanxlu rAjanu opipxdudu; AmeVle seVnApatiyAda sudhaqtiyU, maMtirxyAda vadhaRnanU, shaturxMjaya, shaturxhA, BiVma, samaratApana eMba rAjakumArarU yudadhxsananxdadhxrAgi horaDalu, puroVhitanAda vidAyxpatiyu shivashakitxmaMtarxgaLiMda avarige taMtarxshAsotxrXVkarxriVtiyalilx digarxkeSx, aMgarakaSxNegaLanunx neraveVrisi, jayavAgaleMdu AshiVvaRdisidanu.

AmeVle rAjaniVti daMDaniVti shAsAtxrXnusAravAgi seVneyanunx viBAgamADi vUyxhavanunx racisi, maMtirxyU seVnApatiyU rAjakumArarU sidadhxrAdaru. A samayadalilx nAradanu iMdarxnanunx samiVpisi kAmana sahAyakAkxgi deVvategaLelalxroDane avanU hoVgabeVkeMdU salahe mADalu, iMdarxnU hAge mADidanu; rAjaseVneyoDane deVvategaLige yudadhxvAraMBisitu; iMdarxputarxnAda jayaMtanu vasugaNadoDane sudhaqtiyanunx edurisidanu; deVvategaLige soVlAgutitxralu, savitaqmuMtAda vasugaNavu mAnavarAjaseVneyanunx dhavxMsamADitu; sudhaqti putarxnAda raNadhiVranu avaranunx saMharisi sAvitarxnanunx muSiTxyiMda hoDedy keDavidanu; jayaMtanu adhamaRvAda riVtiyalilx hiMdiniMda raNadhiVrananunx shakAtxyXyudhadiMda hoDedanu; avanu mUCiRtanAgalu jayaMtanu sAvitarxnanunx iMdarxna samiVpakekx karedu taMdanu.

ecacxragoMDa raNadhiVranu jayaMtananunx niMdisi, jayaMtananUnx avanige neravAgi baMda aginxyanUnx hoDedu keDavidanu; iMdarxnu vajArxyudhadiMda hoDedu raNadhiVrananunx keDavidanu; rAjautarxnAda BiVmanu baMdu iMdarxnanunx gadeyiMda hoDeyalu iMdarxnu alugADadaMtAdanu; Aga BiVmanu airAvatavanunx hoDedu keDavi, vajArxyudhavanunx kitutxkoMDu hoDeyahoVgalu adu kaNamxreyAyitu; iMdarxna neravige vAyuvu baMdu, gadAGAtadiMda mUCeRhoMdidanu; Aga iMdarx, varuNa, kubeVraru oTiTxge yudadhxkekx baMdaru; itara rAjaputarxrU sadhaqtiyU raNadhiVranige neravAdaru; iMdarxnu sudhaqtiyoDaneyU, shaturxMjayanu kubeVranoDaneyU, shaturxhaNanu varuNanoDaneyU, BiVmanu citarxrathanoMdigU, samaratApananunx yamanige edurAgiyU, shaturxMhayapuratxnAda viVravikarxmanu vAuvanunx parxtiBaTisiyU, shaturxGanxna maganAda viVraseVnanu aginxge parxtiyAgiyU, BiVmana maganAda viVraBAnuvu jayaMtananunx edurisiyU, samaratApanana maganAda viVrAgarxganu vasuvanunx viroVdhisiyU dhamaRyudadhxvanunx mADidaru;

citarxseVnanu mAyAyudadhxvanAnxraMbisalu, BiVmanu asatxrXdiMda taDedu avananunx hoDedu keDavidanu; viVrAgarxganu sAvitarxna KaDagxdiMda savxlapx mUCiRtanAdarU, AmeVle avananunx gadeyiMda hoDedu biVLisidanu; viVraseVnanu aginxyanunx hoDedu keYsere hiDidanu; viVravikarxmanu vAyuvina aMkushadiMda hoDeyalapxTuTx, A aMkushadiMdaleV vAyuvanunx hiMtirugisi hoDedu keDavidanu; shaturxM jayanu adhamaRdiMda hoDeda kuBeVrananunx niMdisi muSiTxyiMda parxharisi uruLisidanu; keYsereyAda avananunx pulasatxyXmuniyu biDisidanu; viVraBAnuvina ETiniMda jayaMtanu mUCiRtanAdanu, shaturxhaNanu varuNananunx keDavidanu; avanu kUDale edudx shaturxhaNananunx pAshadiMda kaTiTxdanu. A varuNananunx samaratApananu ETiniMda mUCeRgoLisalu, avananunx roVgagaLoDane baMda yamanu edurisidanu. AdarU samaratApananu avarelalxranUnx hoDedoVDisidanu; Aga mununxgigxda yamana koVNavu avananunx koMbinalilx etitxkomDu hoVgutitxralu ecacxtatx A samaratApananu adanunx muSiTxyiMda hoDedu biVLisalu, aSaTxralilx ecacxtutx mununxgigxda yamananunx sadhaqtiyu hoDedu biVLisidanu; aSaTxralilx yamanige imdarxnu neravAgi baMdanu;
sudhaqtiyu iMdarxna kiriVTagaLanunx punaH punaH keDavidanu; kaDege iMdarxnanUnx mUCeRgoLisidanu; kaDeyalilx elalxranUnx rAjaputarxru baMdigaLanAnxgi mADi tegedukoMDu horaTaru;

iMdArxdigaLu keYsereyAdudanunx noVDi kAmanu avarelalxranunx rAjapwtarxranunx samAdhAnagoLisutAtx, shaMkaraniMda varavanunx paDedidadx viVravarxtarAjanige samAcAravanunx arikemADi karetaralu viVraseVnananunx kaLuhisi, tAnu kAmanoDane yudadhxkekx niMtanu; tamamx seYnikaranunx viVravANIyimda hiMtirugisi huriduMbisi deVvaseVneyoDane yudadhxmADuvaMte perxVrisidanu; kAmananunx hoDedu mUCeRgoLisi, avana muMcina parxhAradiMda shakitxguMdidadx avayavagaLulaLxvanAgidudxdarimda tAnU parxjecnxtapipxbidadxnu;

viVraseVnanu viVravarxtarAjananunx dAriyalilxyeV kaMDu vijAcnxpisalu avanu raNAMgaNakekx baMdu, aSaTxralilxyeV ecacxtutx baMda kAmanoDane yudadhxkekx niMtanu; rAjaputarxrelalxrU ecacxtutx avanige namasakxrisidaru; A rAjanu yudadhxmADutAtx nAlakxneya dina tananx balavu kuMdutirxruvudanunx managaMDu. shaMkarananunx dhAyxnisalu, shivana anugarxhadiMda tirxshUlavu avana neravige baMditu; adarimda kAmananunx hoDeyalu avanu bidadxnu; AgatAne baMdidadx lakiSxmXya dUtaru kAmananunx lakiSxmXya samiVpakekx oyadxru; itatxlAgi iMdArxdigaLanunx hiDidukoMDu rAjanU rAjaputarxrU jayashAligaLAgi rAjadhAnige hiMtirugidaru; Adare puroVhitanAda vidAyxpatiyu deVvategaLanunx avamAnagoLIsabAradeMdU, avaru mAnavarige pUjayxreMdU tiLiyaheVLalu, rAjanu avarelalxranUnx biDugaDemADi gwravisidanu; avaru savxgaRkekx hoVdaru; viVravarxta rAjanU elalxroDane rAjadhAnige baMduseVridanu;

viVravarxtana ETiniMda mUCeRgoMDidadx kAmananunx dUtaru lakiSxmXya samiVpakekx taMdu naDeda samAcAravanunx heVLidaru; lakiSxmXyu tirxpurAdeVviyanunx dhAyxnisi kAmananunx amaqtamayavAda daqSiTxyiMda noVDalu avanu mUCeRtiLidedadxnu; viVravarxtanu shivaBakatxnAdudariMda kAmanige soVluMTAyiteMdu tAyiyiMda tiLidu, kAmanu tAyiya budidhxvAdadaMte shivananunx pArxthiRsade avananUnx jayisuveneMdanu; Aga tirxpurAdeVviyanunx lakiSxmXyu pArxthiRsalu, gwriyu alilxge baMdaLu; shivananunx pArxthiRseMdu gwriya budidhxvAdavanunx kAmanu tirasakxrisalu, kAmananunx shivaniMda bUdiyAgeMdu shapisidaLu. kupitaLAda lakiSxmXyu geriyanunx dakaSxyAgadalilx bUdiyAgeMdu shapisidaLu; hiVge shApaparxtishApagaLAgi, lakiSxmXV gwriVdeVviyarige yudadhxvAgi, gwriyu mUCiRtaLAgalu, kaDege barxhAmx, viSunx, maheVshavxraru baMdu kaLuhisida sarasavxtideVviyiMda shApavimoVcaneyu sUcitavAgi ibabxrigU samAdhAnavu EpaRTiTxtu;

ivara shApagaLige anusAravAgi lakiSxmXdeVvige pativiraha duHKa maqtigaLU, gwriVdeVvigU avu heVge saMBavisiduveMdu parashurAmanu datAtxterxVyananunx keVLidanu; baqMdA matutx BUdeVviyaru viSuNxvanunx pUjisi olisikoMDaru; lakiSxmXge ahasaneyAyitu; viSuNxvu guTATxgi avroDane viharisutitxdudxdanunx sarasavxtiya maneyiMda hiMtirugida lakiSxmXyu baMdu kaMDu viSuNxvanunx biTuTxhoVdaLu; lakiSxmXyu duHKadiMda karagi padAmxnadiyAgi haridaLu; barxhamxna saBeyalilx sarasavxtiyu kacaCxpiV viVNeyalilx nuDisida rAgagatiyanunx nAradanu kaliyutitxdAdxga apasavxravanunx nuDisalu padAmxnadiyu nakakxLu; adariMda koVpagoMDa nAradana shApadiMda A nadiya niVrelalxvU batitxhoVyitu; BagiVrathanu gaMgAnadiyanunx karedukoMDu hoVguvAga adu padAmxnadiV pAtarxdalilx parxvahisitu; idariMda shApavimoVcaneyAgalu padAmxnadiyu bahudUrada meVle beVreyAgi hariyitu; saMgamada tiVthaRdalilx heVgoV hAge viBAga tiVthaRdalilx sAnxnavu sadagxtiparxdavu; gaMgAvataranada katheyanunx nAradanu padAmxnadiVdeVvige heVLidanu; vASakxli eMba dAnavarAjana tapasusx, barxhamxna vara, dharAmxcaraNegaLiMda tirxloVkAdhipatayx, iMdarxjaya, viSuNxvu vAmananAgi baMdu mUraDi nelavanunx beVDidudu; bAgaRva baqhasapxtiyu beVDaveMdarU dAnaveVshanu dAnamADidudu; vAmananu tirxvikarxmanAgi eraDu hejejxgaLiMda BUmAyxkAshagaLanunx Akarxmisi mUraneya hejejxyiMda avananunx meTiTx moVkaSxvanunx koTaTxnu; Aga eraDaneya hejejxya AMguSaThxdiMda barxhAmxMDakaTAhavu BinanxvAgi gaMgA parxvAha baMditu. barxhamxnu kamaMDaluvinalilx adanunx hiDidiDalu, iMdarxnu adanunx savxgaRkekx taMdanu; sagaraputarxra sadagxtigAgi BagiVrathana tapasisxniMda BUmige gaMgA pArxpitx; gaMgA saMgadiMda padAmx shApamoVcaneyAgi viSunxsamAgama:

gwriVdeVviya kathe; BasAmxsurana tapasisxge mecicx Ishavxranu varavanunx koDalu. adara pariVkeSxgAgi shivana taleya meVleyeV keYyiTuTx noVDalu baralu, Ishavxranu ODi aMtadhARna hoMdidanu; viSuNxvu BasAmxsurananunx koMdanu; dakaSxna tapasisxge mecicx gwriyu avana magaLAgi, umA, dAkASxyaNiV eninxsikoMDu, shivananunx maduveyAdaLu; saBege hememxyiMda baMda dakaSxnanunx shivanu gwravisadiralu, dakaSxnu yAgakekx shivananunx kareyalilalx; umeyu taMdeya yAgakekx hoVgi, shivaniMdeyanunx keVLi, yAgada aginxyalilx deVhavanunx biTaTxLu; parA shakitxyu gaMgeyAda kathe; tirxpurAdeVviyeV BakAtxnugarxhakAkxgi tirxpathagA eninxsikoMDidALe

parashurAmanu datatxguruvanunx kuritu mAnavaralilx yAgAcaraNeyu heVge rUDhige baMditu? kAmanu shaMkarananunx heVge jayisidanu? avananunx shaMkaranu heVge dahisidanu? eMdu keVLidanu; guruvu heVLidanu; mAnavaru niSAkxmarAgiruvudarimda deVvategaLige adhiVnarAgilalxvu. vaqSiTxyu sakAladalilx elelxDeyalUlx tAnAgiyeV savxtaMtarxvAgi AgutitxruvudariMda mAnavarU savxtaMtarxrAgidAre. viVravarxtanu iMdarxnanunx deVvategaLanUnx biTaTxmeVle avanu badukiruvavarege iMdArxdigaLu senxVhadiMda idadxru. AmeVle barxhamxnalilx moreyiDalu, avanu vaqSATxyXdhipatayxvanunx iMdarxnige koTuTx adakAkxgi mAnavaru yAgamADabeVkAgi baMdu, deVvategaLige adhiVnarAgiruvaMte mADidanu; yAgAcaraNeyu rUDhige baMditu; kAmanu savaRvijayavanunx Ashisalu lakiSxmXyu tirxpurAdeVviya swBAgAyxSoTxVtatxravanunx upadeVshisidaLu; maMdarAcalada guheyalilx kAmana tapasusx, tirxpurAdeVyu parxsananxLAgi A aSoTxVtatxradalilxruva paMcadashAkaSxriya swBAgayx videyxyanunx savxpanxdalilx upadeVshisidaLu; adariMa sididhxyanunx paDeda bage;

tirxpurAmUritxya savxrUpa dhAyxnadiMda deVviyu parxtayxklaSxLAdudu; kAmanu sotxVtarxmADidudu; swBAgayx navaratanx sotxVtarxda mahime; kAmanu ApatxkAmanAgi EnanUnx Ashisadiralu, avana modalina AsheyaMte savaRvijayitavxvanunx paDeyalu, deVviyu tananx Ayudhadimda dhanuBARNagaLanunx horahomimxsi tegedukoTaTxLu; avanu savaRvijayakekx horaTanu;

parashurAmana pArxthaRneyaMte guruvu swBAgAyxSoTxVtatxravanunx upadeVshisidanu; adariMda pATha, havana, shirxVcakArxcaRne, bArxhamxNa suvAsiniV BoVjanadAnagaLanunx mADabeVku; modalina katheyanunx muMduvarisidudu; patiniMdAsharxvaNadiMda deVhatAyxgamADi AkAsharUpadalilxdadx gwriyanunx himavaMtanu ArAdhisidanu; vAmadeVvana upadeVshadimda tirxpurAdeVviyalilx BakatxnAgiruvudanunx nAradanu shAlxGisi, gwriV deVviyiMda putirxVpArxpitxyAguvudeMdu tiLisidanu; gwriVdeVviya katheyanunx heVLidanu;

tArakAsuranu tapasisxniMda jagatasxqSiTxsAmathayxRvanUnx paDedu, barxhAmxMDagaLanUnx veVdagaLanUnx iMdarx barxhAmxdigaLanUnx saqSiTxsi avariMda seVvisalapxDutAtx, madoVdadhxtanAgi, sAvxdhiVnarAgadiruva barxhAmxdigaLanunx shareyalilxTaTxnu, shaciyanUnx paDeyalu dUtananunx kaLuhalu, avaLu tanagiMta adhikaLAda lakiSxmXyanunx paDeya heVLidaLu; lakiSxmXV viSuNxgaLu yudadhxdalilx parAjitarAgi aMtadhARnavAdaru; shaciyu guruvina upadeVshadaMte gwriVdeVviyanunx pArxthiRsalu, avaLu parxtayxkaSxLAgi tArakAsuranoDane yudadhxmADi, tananx koVpadiMda huTiTxda mahAkALiyu tArakAsurananunx vadhisidaLu; iMtaha gwriyanunx Bajisi sididhxyanunx paDe eMdu nAradanu heVLi hoVdanu;

parashurAmanige guruvu gwriya aSoTxVtatxranAmavanunx heVLidanu; himavaMtanige gwriyu parxtayxkaSxLAgi avana koVrikeyaMte tAnu janamxgarxhaNa mADenenalu, himavaMtanu oMdunUru vaSaRgaLavarege punaH GoVra tapasasxnunx mADidanu; A tapoVjAvxleyiMda noMda barxhAmx, viSuNx, muMtAdavarU pArxthiRsalu, jagatAkxyaRvu muMduvariyuvudakAkxgiyU, tirxpurAdeVviya udedxVshadaMteyU gwriyu himavaMtana magaLAgi huTiTxdaLu; Adare savxsavxrUpa visamxqtiyAgiraleMdu shapisidaLu;

gwriVdeVviyu divayxrUpadiMda huTiTxdarU himavaMtana koVrikeyaMte pArxkaqtahishuvinaMte AdaLu; maMgaLa kAramxgaLAdavu; avaLu doDaDxvaLAgalu gagARcAyaRna upadeVshadaMte avaLanunx shivanige vivAha mADikoDalu nishacxyavAyitu; AmeVle nAradanu baMdu avaLanunx viSuNxvige koDuvudu meVlenanxlu himavaMtanu shApada mahimeyiMda hiMdinadelalxvanUnx maretu opipxdanu nAradanu hiMtirugidanu;

taMdeya I nishacxyavanunx opapxde pAravxtiyu yArigU tiLisade aramaneyanunx biTuTx horaTu nAlukxjana saKiyaroDane kADinalilx gaMgAtiVradalilx tirxpurAdhAyxnadalilxdadxLu; jAcnxnakalikA sotxVtArx; tirxpurAdeVviyu parxsananxLAgi iSATxthaRsididhxyanunx karuNisidaLu;

pAravxtiyu horaTuhoVdameVle himavaMtanu duHKitanAgi magaLanunx huDukutAtx hejejxgaLa gurutina meVle baMdu pAvaRtiyanunx kaMDanu; tananx nishacxyakekx viroVdhavanunx kaMDu taMdeyu vAtasxlayxdiMda magaLa nishacxyavanunx opipxdanu: nAradanu alilxge baralu magaLa nishacxyavanunx tiLisidanu; koVpagoMDa nAradana apapxNeyaMte vijayAdigaLu pavaRta rAjananunx baMdhisi, gwriyanunx hiDidu karedukoMDu hoVgalu baralu, tAyiyanUnx magaLanUnx puroVhitanAda kAshayxpanu samAdhAnapaDisidanu;

kAshayxpanu gwirya hiMdina tapasesxV muMtAdudanunx tiLisalu; pUvaRsamxraNeyiMda mahimAnivxtaLAgi savxrUpavanunx paDeda gwriyanunx kAshayxpanu sutxtisidanu; hiVge horaTa gwriyanunx nAradanU sutxtisidanu; gwriyanunx baMdhisalu baMdidadx viSuNxvina pASaRdaranunx nigarxhisidaLu; idanunx keVLi viSuNxvu koVpagoMDu baMdu cakArxyudhadiMda parxharisalu, gwriVkoVpadiMduMTAda jAvxlAmuKiVdeVviyu cakArxyudhavanUnx garuDanUnx suTuTx, viSuNxvanunx nuMgidaLu; deVvategaLa pArxthaRneyaMte gwriyu jAvxlAmukiVdeVviyanunx samAdhAnapaDisi, viSuNxvanunx biDisi, jAvxlAmuKiyanunx parxLayakArayxvanunx neraveVrisalu odaguvaMte A paravxtadalilx sAthxpisidaLu; amaqtadaqSiTxyiMda viSuNx muMtAdavaranunx badukisi taMdeyaNunx biDisi, tananx bAlAsavxrUpavanunx paDedaLu; AmeVle barxhamxnu heVLidaMte pAravxtiyanunx shaMkaranige koTuTx tavxSaTxqviniMda nirimxtavAda vivAha maMTapadalilx maduveyanunx neraveVrisidaru; elalxrU pirxVtarAgi hiMtirugidaru;

kAmadahanada, viSuNx cakarxpArxpitxya kathegaLanunx keVLalu, parashurAmanige guruvu heVLidanu; jAvxlAmuKiV deVviyiMda sudashaRna cakarxvu suTuTxhoVdameVle murAsuranu viSuNxvanunx jayisalu baMdanu; cakarxvilalxde viSuNxvu soVtu aMtadhARna hoMdidanu; viSuNxvu jAvxlAmuKiVpavaRtadalilx tapasusxmADi A deVviyiMda hiMdina cakArxyudhakikxMta hecicxna shakitxyuLaLx cakarxvanunx paDedu, murAsurananunx saMharisidanu; shivanu tapasusxmADutitxralu, tArakAsurananu shUrapadAmxsuranoDane tapashayxkitxyiMda barxhAmxMDagaLanunx jayisi, iMdArxdigaLanunx nigrxhisidanu; barxhamxna budidhxvAdadaMte shivaputarxnAda kumArasAvxmiyiMda mAtarx avara nigarxhavu sAdhayxveMdu tiLidu, shivananunx pArxthiRsalu horaTa iMdarxnige tapasisxna sAthxnadalilx elalxvU nishecxVSaTxvAgiruvudu gotAtxyitu Aga guruvu gwriVdeVviyanunx ArAdhisuvaMte heVLalu, adaraMte mADalu, gwriV deVviyu parxtayxkaSxLAdaLu;

iMdarxna pArxthaRneyanunx keVLi gwriyu QuSishApadiMda tanage makakxLAguva saMBavavilalxvenanxlu, A katheyanunx keVLida iMdarxnige hiMge heVLidaLu; oMdu dina udAyxnadalilxruvAga maqgayugamxvu kirxVDisutitxdudxdanunx vinoVdakekx hiDidutarisidaLu; Aga maqga rUpadalilxdadx A QuSiyiMda makakxLAgadiraleMdu shApavu baMditu; hAgeyeV shaMkaranigU shApavu baMditu, heVgeMdare, terxVtAyugadalilx bArxhamxNaru tapaHparxBAvadiMda deVvategaLanUnx vashapaDisikoMDaru; iMdarxnu barxhamxnoDane viSuNxvinalilx vijAcnxpisalu elalxrU shivananunx paDedu pArxthiRsalu, avara koVrikeyanunx salilxsalu mahAdeVvanu viparxsitxrXVyara pAtivarxtayxda BaMgavanunx mADidanu; viparxru shivanige sitxrXVyaralilx napuMsakatavxvanUnx, liMgapatanavanUnx uMTumADuvaMte shapisidaru; liMgavu biVLutitxralu jagadarxkaSxNegAgi barxhamxnu piVThavAgi, viSuNxvu yoVni (pANivaTaTxlu)yAgi, A liMgavanunx dharisalu, BAradiMda kusida avarelalxranUnx viSuNxvu matetx AdisheVSarUpanAgi dharisidanu; shivana koVpavanunx taDeyalu barxhamxnu liMgarUpanAgi AviBaRvisalu, viSuNxvU liMgAcaRneyanunx mADidanu; hiVge liMgAcaRneyu deVvaloVkadalilx rUDhige baMditu

BUloVkadalilx liMgAcaRnege parxcAra lABavAdudanunx pAravxtiyu hiVge heVLIdaLu; shivanu tirxpurAdeVviyanunx upAsane mADalu, tirxpurAdeVviyu parxtayxkaSxLAgi shivanu liMgAtamxkaneMdU, liMgAcaRne ilalxde yAva pUjeyU saPalavAgadeMdU anugarxhisidaLu; hiVge viGanxvidadxrU shivajayakAkxgi kAmananunx kaLuhisuva upAyavanunx mADeMdu pAvaRtiyu iMdarxnige heVLi aMtadhARnavAdaLu; kAmanu iMdarxnige vAgAdxnamADidudariMda hiMdina tananx parABavavidadxrU, tirxpurAdhAyxnamADutAtx shivajayakekx horaTanu; duHKitaLAda ratiyanUnx tAyiyAda lakiSxmXya vashadalilx biTuTx horaDalu lakiSxmXyiMda ratiya samAdhAna.

kAmanu tirxpurAdeVviyanunx ArAdhisalu, Akeyu parxsananxLAdaLu; idanunx tiLidu lakiSxmXyu baMdu kAmana meVlidadx gwriya shApanivaqtitxyanunx pArxthiRsalu, gwriVshApadaMte kAmana I deVhavu uridu hoVgi, inonxMdu deVhadiMda avanu tAyiyanunx saMtoVSapaDisuvudAgi anugarxhisidaLu; kAmananunx kaNiNxnalilx AkaSiRsidadxriMda kAmAkiSxV eMdu tirxpurAdeVvige hesarAyitu; parxtikAmanu shivananunx puSapxbANadiMda hoDeyalu, avananunx dahisi, barxhAmxdigaLa sutxtiyiMda shivanu shAMtanAdanu;

kAmadAhadiMda iSaTxsididhxyAgadiralu iMdarxnu barxhamxna mUlaka shivananunx pArxthiRsi tArakAsusana nAshakAkxgi magananunx paDeyuvaMte opipxsidanu; shivanu girijeyalilx ramisalu jAribidadx viVrayxvanunx BUmiyU, aginxyU, gaMgeyU dharisalAradiralu, keYlAsa pavaRtadalilxruva sharavaNadalilx adanunx biDalu barxhamxnu heVLidanu; gaMgAdigaLu dharisalArada viyaRvanunx sharavaNavu heVge dharisiVteMdu gaMgeyu keVLalu BasAmxsuraniMda shivanu aMtahiRtanAgalu, shoVkadiMda gwriVdeVviya deVhavu cUrAgi sharavaNavAgidudxdarimda adu shivaviVrayxvanunx dharisabalulxdeMdu barxhamxnu tiLiyaheVLalu, gaMgeyu alilx adanunx biTatxLu; kaqtitxkAdeVviyara taqpitxgAgi sakxMdanu SaNumxKanAdudu; deVvategaLelalxrU tamamx AyudhagaLiMda hecucx balavuLaLx AyudhagaLanunx hora homimxsi avanunx sakxMdanige koTaTxru; elalxrU gwravisidaru, iMdarxnu soVtu kwrxMvapavaRtadalilx aDagalu, adanunx sakxMdanu BeVdisidanu; kaDege barxhamxna mUlaka iMdarxnu sakxMdanige sharaNAgatanAgi pArxthiRsidaMte seVnApatitavxvanunx sivxVkarisidanu; ameVle tArakAsura, shUrapadamx ivaranunx saMharisi sakxMdanu iMdarxnige muMcinaMte terxYloVkAyxdhipatayxvanunx koTaTxnu; savARjeVyarAda A rAkaSxsara jayada visAtxravanunx parashurAmanu keVLalu datatx guruvu heVLidanu; sanaukxmAranu QuSaBapavaRtadalilx tapasusx mADi, deVvAsuravijayada savxpanxda vivaraNeyanunx alilxge baMdidadx barxhamxniMda tiLidanu; sevxVcACxjanamx; pAvaRtiVparameVshavxraru avana tapasisxna sithxrate veYrAgayxgaLige mecicxdaru; avaribabxra pArxthaRneyaMte avarige maganAdudu; ayoVnijanAgi tArakAdigaLasaMhAravanunx mADidanu; sakxMdaH, aginxBUH, gAMgeVya, pAvaRtiVsutaH, kAtiRkeVyaH; SaDAnanaH, deVvaseVnApatiH, eMdu kumArasAvxmige anavxthaRnAmagaLu;

datatxguruvu parashurAmanige BAratiVdeVviya cariterxyanunx heVLidanu; barxhamxnu saBeyalilx sAvitirxVsutxtiyanunx keVli nakakxnu; A anAdaratirasAkxravanunx vANiyu AkeSxVpisi, savaRkArayxnivARhakUkx AvashayxkavAda shakitxyasavxrUpaLAda tananx sahAyavilalxde yAriMdalU EnU sAgadeMdaLu; gaMDananunx alalxgaLeda heMDitiyu, tanonxDane yajacnxBAginiyAgalu anahaRLeMdu shapisalu, avaLupatinxyAgiralu anahaRLAdare avanu golilxtiya kAmukanAgaleMdu shapisidaLu; avara koVpadiMda jagatutx naDugitutx; harihararu baMdu vANiyeV goVpasitxrxVyAgi huTuTxvaLeMdu tiLisi samAdhAnamADidarU, koVpasheVSadiMda vANiVdeVvige golalxtiyAgiruvAga savxrUpada ajAcnxnaviraleMdU, barxhamxnu niMdayx sitxrXVyalilx kAmukanAgaleMdU shapisidaru; AmeVle barxhamxnu yAgamADabeVkAdAga BAratiVdeVviyanunx karedarU baradiralu, viSuNxviniMda goVpasitxrXV obabxLanunx tarisi maduveyAgi sakAldalilx yAgavanunx AraMBisidanu; vANiyu koVpagoMDu beTaTxkekx hoVdaLu; avaLa koVpAginxyu elalxranUnx suDutitxralu, nivArisalu baMda deVvAdigaLanunx shareyalilx iTaTxLu; lakiSxmXV, gwriVdeVviyarU, hari, hararU, barxhamxnoDane baMdu pArxthiRsidaru; barxhamxnanunx kaMDu sAvitirxya koVpavu hecacxlu pAvaRtiyu tirxpurAdeVviyanunx pArxthiRsidaLu; tirxpurAdeVviyu bMdu samAdhAnamADi deVvAdigaLanunx biDisi, barxhAmxdigaLanunx ujijxVvanagoLisalu, sAvitirxyu kaSxmApArxthaRnemADi barxhamxnoDane iralu opapxde tirxpurAdhAyxnadalilxruveneMdaLu;

AmeVle barxhamxnu sAvitirxyu ilalxde yAgAcaraNeyeV asaMBavavAgi, janarige vAyxdhipiVDeyU, tanage niMdApArxpitxyU heVge nivAraNeyAgabeVkeMdu pArxthiRsalu, tirxpurAdeVviyu goVpakaneyxya pUvaR vaqtatxvanunx vivarisidaLu; hiMde supAshavxRneMba viparxnu tapasisxniMda sAvitirxyanunx parxtayxkaSxmADikoMDanu; tAnu balAtAkxradiMda goVpavadhU saMgamADidudanunx nAradanu kaMDu, goVpanAgeMdu shApakoTaTxnu; adanunx parihariseMdu prxthiRsalu, deVviyu goVpanAdarU tananx aMshada magaLanUnx, viSuNxvina aMshada magananUnx paDedu, sadagxtiyanunx paDeyuve. eMdu samAdhAna heVLi sAvitirxyu aMtadhARnavAdaLu; A sAvitarxyXMshasaMBUtaLeV I goVpavadhU eMdu, barxhamxna shApadiMda niVnu tiLiyalilalxveMdU, vivarisalu, sAvitirxyu taqpitxgoMDaLu; I vaNaRmayavAda gAyatitxrXV upadeVshavanunx upanayanadalilx paDedu terxYvaNiRkaru divxjarAguvaru; eMdU, I gAyatitxrXyanunx ninanx muKadiMda horaDuva veVdamayaLAdudariMda aMgiVkarisiyAgavanunx mADu eMdU heVLi, tirxpurAdeVviyu gAyatitxrXVyalilx parxveVshisidaLu; elalxrU deVviyanunx sutxtisidaru; I samayadalilx alilxge baMda goVpa patiyu tananx magaLAda gAyatitxrXyanunx tananx manege barabeVkeMdU pArxthiRsalu, avaLu muMde naMda goVpanAgi huTuTxva ninage gwriV eMba magaLAgi huTUTxvenu; I viSuNxvu nananx tamamxnAgi huTuTxvanu; Aga nAnu viMdhayxvAsiniyAgi janaranunx udadhxrisuvenu; eMdu anugarxhisalu goVpa patiyu tapatxnAgi hiMtirugidanu; tirxpurAdeVviyu aMtadhARnavAdaLu; sAvitirxyu pavaRtavanunx AsharxyisidaLu; barxhamxnu gAyatitxrXyanunx sivxVkarisiyAgavanunx neraveVrisidanu;

gAyatirxya avatAra viSayavanunx tiLiseMdu parashurAmanu keVLalu datAtxterxVyanu, deVvategaLu tirxpurAdeVviyanunx olisuva mAtaqkAsutxtiyanunx heVLi, gAyatirxyu ipapxtetxMTaneya yugadalilx rAkaSxsaru manusAyxrAgi huTuTxvaru; heVgeMdare, kAlaneVmiyu madhurAPaTaTxNadalilx vaMdarxvamshada ugarxseVnanamaganAda kaMsanAgiyU, hiraNayxkashipuvu ceVdivaMshadalilx shishupAlanAgiyU, hiraNAyxkaSxnu daMtavakarxnAgiyU, narakAsuranu jarAsaMdhanAgiyU huTuTxvaru; ivara BAravanunx taDeyalArade BUdeVviyu barxhAmxdigaLoDane viSuNxvina samiVpadalilx pArxthiRsalu alilx parxtayxkaSxnAda shivanU elalxrU tirxpurAdeVviya pArxthaRneyanunx mADidaru; deVviyu parxtayxkaSxLAgi avana koVrikeyaMte naMdare magaLAgiyU, viSuNxvU nasudeVvana maganAda kaqSaNxnAgiyU avatarisuvudAgi heVLi, kaMsAdisaMhAravAguvudeMdu anugarxhisidaLu; adaraMte viSuNxvu deVvakiyalilx huTiTxdanu; avananunx vasudeVvanu naMdana manege taMdu alilxTuTx, alilx huTiTxdadx kAlarAtirxyanunx tegedukoMDuhoVgi, kaMsanige koTaTxnu; avanu A maguvanUnx kolalxlu horaTga A maguvu meVle hAri; ninanx shaturxvu beVrekaDe beLedubaMdu ninanxnunx nAshamADaleMdu shapisi aMtadhARnavAdaLu; AmeVle goVpasitxrXVyaru kaqSaNxsamAgamavanunx paDeyalu kAtAyxyanaQuSiya sahAyavanunx keVLalu, avanu tirxpurAdhayxnadiMda avara koVrikeyanunx tiLisalu, deVviyu kAtAyxyaniVvarxtavanunx Acarisidare iSaTxsididhxyAguvudeMdu anugarxhisidaLu; avaru adanAnxcarisi iSATxthaRvanunx paDedaru; parashurAmanige kAtAyxyaniVvarxtada vivaragaLanUnx guruvu heVLidanu.

shirxVkAtAyxyiniV deVviya katheyanunx heVLabeVkeMdu parashurAmanu pArxthiRsalu datAtxterxVyamuniyu adanunx heVLidudu; shirxVkaqSaNxnu yAdavaroDane dAvxrakAnagarakekx oVdameVle, shuMBa, nishuMBa eMba rAkaSxsaru goVkulakekx baMdu naMda, goVpakaneyxyaru muMtAdavaranunx serehiDidukoMDu hoVgalu parxyatinxsidudu; yashoVdeyu kAtAyxyanana budidhxvAdadaMte kAtAyxyaniVdeVviyanunx pArxthiRsalu, A deVviyu avaroDane yudadhxmADi soVlisi ODisidudu; nishumBanu viMdhayxpavaRtada guheyalUlx, shuMBanu gaMgAnadiyalUlx aDagiralu, deVviyu kALiV muMtAgi mUru rUpagaLanunx tALi, avaranunx saMharisidudu; kaliyugada anAcAragaLa vaNaRneyanunx keVLi avara udAdhxrakAkxgi deVviyu alilx nelesidudu;

shuMBa, nishuMBa, eMba rAkaSxsara katheyanunx heVLabeVkeMdu BAgaRvarAmanu keVLalu datatxguruvu heVLidudu; AdideYtayxrAda madhu, keYTaBara vaMshadalilx shuMBa, nishuMBaru huTiTx, barxhamxnanunx kuritu tapasusx mADi, avaniMda puruSaru tamamxnunx kolalxlAgadiruvaMte varavanunx paDedu, mUru loVkagaLanUnx jayisi, savxgaRvanunx Akarxmsi, iMdArxdigaLanunx ODisidudu; deVvategaLu barxhamxnalilx more iDalu, avanu shiva, viSuNxgaLoDane, gaMgAtiVradalilx tirxpurA deVviyanunx ArAdhisidudu; tirxpurAdeVviyu parxsananxLAgi gwriVdeVviyanunx kaLuhisalu, avaLu deVvategaLa duHKadiMda koVpagoMDu kALiVrUpavanunx paDedudu; avaLiMda horahomimxda shakitxge camDikA eMdu barxhamxnu hesariTuTxdu; I viSayavanunx tiLiDa caMDamuMDasuraru suMdariyAda shakitxyanunx kAmisi hiDiyahoVgalu, avaLiMda parAjitarAgi hoVgi shumBa nishuMBarige heVLIdudu; sugirxVvadUtananunx avanu kaLuhalu, avanu baMdu deYtayxvadhegAgi deVviyu avatarisiruvudanunx deVviyiMdaleV tiLiduhoVgi heVLidudu; dhUmarxloVanananunx kaLuhisidudu;

caMDikAdeVvige viSuNxvu deVvapArxthaRnAnusAravAgi siMharUpavanunx tALi vAhanavAdudu; deVviyu huMKAradiMdaleV dhUmarxloVcanananunx saMharisalu, siMhavu deYtayxra seVneyanunx nAshamADidudu; A meVle shuMBanishuMBariMda kaLuhalapxTaTx caMDa muMDaranUnx deVviyu saMharisidudu; shuMBana seVneyanunx deVviyu saqjisida bArxhAmxyXdihsakitxgaLu nAshamADalu, rakatxbiVjAsuranu yudadhxkekx muMdAdudu; avana deVhadiMda horaTa takarxbiMdugaLanunx deVviya ApapxNeyaMte kALiyu pAna mADutAtx baralu, shakitxguMdida rakatxbiVjAsurananunx saMharisidudu; AmeVle yudadhxkekx baMda nishuMBA surananunx deVviyu KaDagxdiMda koMdudu; A baLika shuMBaneV yudadhxkekx baMdudu; deVviyU itarashakitxgaLanunx upasaMharisi, obabxLeV avanoDane yudadhxmADidudu; avananunx deVviyu kaDege shUlAyudhadiMda saMharisidadu; deVvategaLu deVviyanunx sutxtisidudu; tirxpurAdeVviyeV barxhAmx viSuNx rudarxrigU shakitxdAyakaLu;

tirxpurAdeVviya aMsharAda kAtAyxyaniV, caMDikAdeVviyara katheynaunx keVLidameVle, deVviya itara katheyanunx keVLalu, datatxguruvu parashurAmanige kALikA deVviya katheyanunx heVLidudu; ditiputarxrAda kAla KaMjaru tapasisxniMda barxhamxnanunx olisikoMDu, puruSarimda ajeVyatavxvanUnx, pArxkaqtacaritarxrAda sitxrXVyariMdalU ajeVyatavxvanUnx varavanAnxgi paDedudu; jitarAda deVvategaLa dudaRshe; avariMda pArxthiRtanAda barxhamxnu apArxkaqtacaritarxLAda sitxrXVyanunx paDeyalu tirxpurAdeVviyanunx pArxthiRsidudu; idanunx tiLidu deYtayxru A deVvategaLanunx saMharisalu baMdudu; tirxpurAdeVviyu mahAshabadxdoDane AviBaRvisi, A rAkaSxsaranunx saMharisi, kALikAdeVviyanunx huMkAradiMda horahomimxsi kaLuhisidudu; avaLu pAnamatatxLAgi A rAkaSxsaranunx saMharisi, kAmadiMda patiyanunx apeVkiSxsidudu; tirxpurAdeVviya apapxNeyaMte shaMkaranu mahAkAla rUpadalilx kALIya iceCxyanunx neraveVrisidudu; rAkaSxsaranenxlalxranUnx koMdu matatxLAda kALiyu tAMDavavADalu, jagatutx naDugalu, adara rakaSxNegAgi viSuNxvina pArxthaRnAnusAravAgi mahAkAlanu samAdhAna paDisidudu; kALiyu alilx nelesidudu;

datatxguruvu dugAR\char'263\char'263KAyxnavanunx BAgaRvanige heVLidudu; aishavxrayxmatatxnAda iMdarxnu viMdhayxshiKaradalilx tapasivxyAda suneVtarxmuniya heMDitiyU, gwtama putirxyU, pativarxteyU, Ada sumiterxyanunx avaLa kurUpakAkxgi `mahiSiV' eMdu hAsayxmADidudu; shaciyu mahiSarUpadiMdaleV ninanx shaturxvanunx parxsavisali eMdu Akeyu shapisidudu; iMdarxniMda pArxthiRsalapxTaTx suneVtarxnu, mudagxlaQuSIya patinxyu vAyuvanunx taDedidudxdanUnx, iMdArxdigaLa seVveyiMda mecicx vAyuvanunx biTuTxdanUnx tiLisi, hAge sumiterxyanenxV pArxthiRsa heVLidudu; shaciyu keYTaBana viVrayxvuLalx hulalxnunx mahiSiyAgi tiMdu, mahiSananunx parxsavisi hoVdudu; tirxpurArAdhaneyalilxdadx deVvategaLanunx biDAlAkaSxnu kolalx baMdudu; shiva, viSaNxvXdideVvategaLiMda horaTa teVjasusxLaLx koVpavu sitxrXVrUpavAgi dugARrUpadalilx siMhArUDhavAgi mahiSAsura vadhege horaTudu;

mahiSana seVnApatiyAda biDAlAkaSxnu palAyana mADalu, yudadhxdalilx siMhavu rAkaSxsaseVneyoLakekx nugigx, udagarx muMtAda aidu jana mahiSana seVnA nAyakaranUnx, udagarx muMtAda eMTu jana mahiSAsurana makakxLalilx, udagarxnanUnx saMharisitu; deVviyu adakekx vishArxMtiyanunx koTuTx, teneV uLidavaranunx saMharisaidaLu; kaDege mahiSanU yudadhxdalilx deVviyiMda saMhaqtanAdudu; deVviyanunx deVvategaLu sutxtisidudu;

shivaneVtArxginxyiMda BasamxvAda kAmanu tirxpurAdeVviya kaNiNxnalilx aDagalu, punaH avanu AviBaRvisidudu heVgeMdu BAgavanu keVLalu datatxguruvu lalitA deVviya katheyanunx heVLidudu; BaMDAsuranu tapoVbaladiMda aneVka barxhAmxMDagaLanUnx tirxmUtiRgaLanUnx saqjisi ALutAtx loVkapiVDakanAdudu; lalitAparameVshavxriV rUpadiMda tirxpurAdeVviyu avananunx koMdudu; deVvapArxthaRneyaMte kAmanu ujijxVvisidudu; kAmanu anaMganAgidadxrU avananunx tananx apAMgadiMda ujijxVvisida avaniMda AhatanAgi shivanu gwriVdeVviyalilx SaNumxKananunx paDedudu; kAlAMtaradalilx moVhiniVrUpadalilxdadx viSuNxvanUnx shivanu saMgamisidudu;

deVvAsurayudadhxdalilx soVta deVvategaLu rAkaaSxsaroDane samudarxmathanadiMda amaqtavanunx paDedudu; rAkaSxsarige tapipxsi deVvategaLige adanunx koDalu viSuNxvu moVhiniVrupadiMda apaharisidudu; shivanu moVhiniVrUpavanunx noVDabayadisusu; tananx iMdirxya nigarxhada hememxyanunx heVLalu, viSuNxvu tirxpurA deVviyanunx tapasisxniMda mecicxsi tirxpurAMshavanunx paDedu, shivanu moVhitanAguvaMte mADidudu; shivanu moVhitanAgi nAcikegoMDudu; kAmanu vidAyxparxvaratxkanU tirxpurABakatxnU Adudu; manAvxdigaLu vidAyxparxvaratxkarU, pArxtasamxraNiVyarAdudu;

BaMDAsurana katheya visAtxravaraNxne; agasatxyXmuniyu viSuNxvanunx tapasisxniMda olisikoMDu lalitAdeVviya katheyanunx heVLenanxlu, avana aMshavuLaLx hayagirxVvanu viSuNxvina apapxNeyaMte agasatxyXnige adanunx heVLidudu; shaMkaraniMda aBayavaravanunx paDedu matatxnAda BaMDAsuranu mUruloVkagaLanunx jayisi, BUloVkadalilx vishukarxnanUnx, pAtALadalilx viSaMgananUnx ALalu niyamisi, tAnu savxgaRdalilx iMdArxdigaLanunx seVvege niyamisidudu; shaciyu guTATxgi pAravxtiyanunx Asharxyisidudu; aushanasaniMda deVvategaLa biDugaDe; deVvategaLiMda shoVNitapurada nAshavAgalu BaMDanu savxgaRvanunx nAshamADi, shUnayx paTaTxNadalilxdudxdu; aneVka barxhAmxMDagaLanunx saqjisi ALutitxdudxdu;

BaMDAsuraniMdAda iMdarxjayavanunx visAtxravAgi heVLeMdu keVLida agasatxyXnige hayagirxVvanu heVLidudu; kAmanu shivakoVpAginxyiMda BasamxvAgalu, gaNeVshanu ABasamxvanunx kUDisi manuSayxrUpavanunx koTuTxdu; pAravxtiya koVrikeyaMte shivanu adanunx badukisu gaNeVshana ATakekx koTuTxdu; avanu tAmasarArAkaSxsanAdudu; avanu tapasisxniMda shivananunx mUrAvaqtitx mecicxsi, ajeVyatavxvanUnx, deVvAsurariMdalU, yoVnijarimdalU amaratavxvanUnx paDedudu. avanu gwriVdeVvige I aMshavanunx tiLisi pAtALadalilx ALutitxdudux, tirxloVkajayavanunx paDedudu; kaDege shaciyanUnx kAmisalu, barxhamxnu avananunx BaMDaneMdu heVLidudu; deVvategaLanunx jayisi tananx seVvege iTuTxdu; idanunx keVLi tArakAsuranU tananx makakxLanunx BaMDAsuranige koTuTx tAnU avanoDane seVridudu; AmeVle barxhAmxdigaLanUnx jayisalu hoVdudu; keYlAsakUkx hoVgi gaNapatiyiMda peTuTx tiMdu mUcipxRtanAgi aDege gwriyiMda jitanAgi, shivana varadimda pArAgi, hiMtirugi shUnayxnagarakekx baMdudu;

BaMDaniMda jitarAdadeVvategaLu avanige seVvakarAgidudxdu; baqhasapxtiya budidhxvAdadaMte vAyu sahAyadiMda himAlayadalilx deVvategaLelalxrU tirxpurApUjeyanunx mADidudu; kaDege yAgada aMtayxdinadalilx mahAshabadxdoDane deVviyu aviBaRvisalu, guruvu deVviyanunx sutxtisidudu; jayajanani

BaMDAsuranAshavanunx guruvu pArxthiRsalu, deVvategaLu tirxpurArAdhaneyanunx mADabeVkeMdu shivanu heVLidudu; avaru hAge mADalu shukArxcArayxnu idanunx tiLidu deYtayxranunx ecacxrisi kaLuhalu, deVviyu deVvategaLanunx jAvxlAmAliniyiMda maremADalu, avaru hiMtirugidudu; yAga pUtiRyAgi, pUNARhutiyalilx deVviyu meYdoVri varavanunx koTaTxdudx;

barxhAmxdigaLa koVrikeyaMte deVviyu jAvxlAmAliniV rUpadalilx meVrushaqMgadalilx vishavxkamaRniMda nimiRtavAda nagaradalilx kAmeVshavxra kAmeVshavxriVrUpadalilx nelesidudu; shivaviSANxvadiBakitxdAvxrakavAda tirxpurA BakitxyeV sherxVyasisxge kAraNa; agasatxyXna heMDitiyAda loVpAmuderxyu tananx taMdeyaMte tirxpurApUjeyiMda shirxVvideyxyanunx paDedu upAsane mADi, shirxVsUkarxvishAnadiMda tirxpurAcaRneyanunx mADidudu; shirxpuravanunx vaNiRsidudu;

shirxVpuranirAMxNakAkxgi catudAvxRra pArxkAra, mahAkAla vasaMtAdisAthxna, mAtaMgAyxdi aSaTxmaMtirxNiVsAthxna, aSaTxBeYravasAthxna, viSuNx shaMkarasAthxna vajArxnadiV, tArAdeVvi, rati manamxtharu, mahApadamxvana, sUrayx soVmapAtarx, cidaginxkuMDa, ciMtAmaNigaqha, shirxVcakarx, paMcabarxhamxmaMca, kAmeVshavxrAMkadalilx joyxVtiramxyiV, tirxpurAsAthxna ivugaLiMda kUDida shirxVnagara nirAmxNavanunx mADeMdu vishavxkaramxnige heVLidudu;

hecucx vishadavAda vivaraNeyanunx tavxSaTxqvu keVLalu barxhamxnu heVLidudu; vidUrxpiNiyAda deVviyu saqjisida barxhAmxdigaLu saqSATxyXdigaLanunx biTuTx tirxpurAcaRneyalilx toDagalu, deVviyu avaranunx nivArisidudu; avarigAgi deVviyu maNidivxVpadalilx sUthxlamUritxyalilx kANisikoMDudu; shivaneVtArxginxyu, viSuNxvitatx samititxniMda javxlisalu, manoVbudAdhxyXdi havisisxniMda cidaginxkuMDadalilx deVviya dhAyxnAviBARvagaLu; kAmeVshavxra, kAmeVshavxriV vivAha; mahA tirxpurasuMdariVdeVviyiMda SoVDasha matutx navashakitxgaLa nirAmxNa;
mahA tirxpurasuMdariV nirimxtavAda shakitxgaLanunx tirxpurA nirimxtavAda shirxVcakarxdalilx AyA sAThxnagaLalilx sAThxpisidudu; mudArxshakitxgaLa vivaraNe; shirxVcakarxdalilx ivara sAthxna viniyoVga;

barxhamxnu tavxSaTxqvige tirxpurAtatavxvanunx shirxVcakarxsavxrUpadoDane heVLidudu; tirxpurAMbeyu cinAmxtarx rUpaLU adivxtiVyaLU AdarU jagatasxqSiTxsithxti layagaLa nidAvxhakAkxgi, barxhAmxdiyAda aneVka rUpaLAgutAtxLe; shakitxgaLu horATavanunx biTuTx tapasisxniMda tamamx tamamx yoVgasAthxnagaLanUnx AdhipatayxgaLanUnx paDedudu; hiVge sitxrXVshakitxvAyxpatxvAda shirxVcakarxdalilx kAmeVshavxranU, mitirxVsha muMtAda guruvagaRdavaranUnx saqjisalu avarU tapasisxniMda shirxVcakarxdalilx takakx sAThxna, adhikAragaLanunx paDedudu;

tavxSaTxqvu barxhamxnanunx kuritu shirxVcakarxdalilx cidaginxkuMDadalilx sitxrXVrUpavanenxV dhAyxnisalu kAraNavanunx keVLalu barxhamxna vivaraNe; guruvagaRdavara nAmagaLanUnx vivarisidudu; mahApadamxvanada madhayxdalilx, shirxVcakarxdalilx, ciMtAmaNigaqhadalilx tirxpurAdeVviyu barxhAmxdi seVvitaLAgidALe; adaraMte meVrushiKaradalilx shirxVpuravanunx nimARNamADenanxlu, hAge mADidudu;

BaMDAsuranu hiMtirugida meVle, nAradaniMda nijavanunx tiLidudu; BaMDAsuranunx tirxpurAmahimeyanunx tiLisi, tananx pUvaRkatheyanunx tiLisidudu; tAnuramAdeVviV dUtanAda mANIkayxsheVkaranu, gaMgeyalilx muLugititxdadx kinanxriyanunx udadhxrisidudu; avaLalilx kAmaneyiMda parxvatiRsalu, ramAshApa, asuratavxpArxpitx; shApamoVcanege tirxpurA deVviyiMda saMhArakAkxgi, kAmadeVvaniMda janana, barxhAmxMDa saqSiTx, adhipatAyxnuBava, Iga lalitA deVviyiMda vadhaniriVkaSxNe, ivugaLanunx keVLi nAradanu hiMtirugihoVdudu;

bAhAyxMtarajAcnxnakAraNagaLa vivaraNeya parxshenxge upapatitxyu inonxMdu KaMDadalAlxguvudeMdu hAritAyananu heVLidudu; datatxguruvu BAgaRvarAmananunx kuritu, hayagirxVvanu agasatxyXnanunx kuritu BaMDAsura, deVviV ivara yudadhxkatheyanunx vivarisidudanunx heVLIdudu; kAmeVshavxranu aginxkuMDa samudUBxtaLAda lalitAdeVviyiMda AviBaRvisidudu; avara vivAha, BaMDavadhege parxyANamADuvudakekx muMce shakitxdeVviyara saqSiTx; Aga nAradanu alilxge baMdu BaMDAsurana sithxtiyanunx tiLisidudu; tirxpurABakatxnAda BaMDanige vadhe heVge? eMba aMshavanunx maMtirxNiVdeVviyiMda tiLidu hiMtirugidudu; nAradana nitayxmukatxteya vivaraNe; lalitAparameVshavxriyu dhanuveRVda, maMtirxNiVdeVvi muMtAdavaroDaNe horaDalu, BaMDanU yudadhxda Avashayxkate aucitayxgaLanunx vimashirsi, yudadhxkekx baMdudu;

tirxpurAparameVshavxriya pAramAthiRka matutx vAyxvahArika rUpagaLu; BaMDAsuranu deVviyoDane yudadxkekx horaTudu; vijayaneMba maMtirxyu mADida rAjaniVtiya salahe; gUDhacArara mUlaka eduru pakaSxda balAbalagaLanunx tiLiyalu amitarxGanx, viduyxnAmxli ivaranunx kaLuhisidudu; parABUtarAgi avaru hiMtirugidudu; gUDhacArana arike;

amitarxGanxna arike; BaMDAsuranu manasisxnoLage tirxpurAparameVshavxriyalilx BakitxyuLaLxvanu; horagina varxvahAradalilx rAkaSxsarAjanige takakxMte viVrayx, shwrayx parxdashaRna; deVviya kaDeyalilx daMDanAyakiya yudadhxsidadhxte;

lalitAparameVshavxriya kumAriyAda emTuvaSaRda vayasisxna bAlAdeVviyu yudodhxVtAsxhavuLaLxvaLu; balAMbAdeVviyu kuTilAkaSxnanunx mUceRgoLisi, vishukarxnanunx edurisidaLu; sArathiyu heVLida apAyashaMkeyanUnx samAdhAna paDisidaLu; bAlAMbAdeVviya parAkarxma;

vishukarxnanUnx, viSaMgananUnx bAlAdeVviyu gudidx mUCeRgoLisidudu; BaMDAsurananunx edurisalu tavakadimda hoVgutAtx aDaDxgisida viSaMgananunx bANadiMda hoDedu mUCeRgoLisidudu; lalitA parxtibiMbarUpaLAda A bAlAMbeyanunx aMtaH jAcnxniyAda BaMDAsuranu bANagaLiMdaleV pUjisidudu; bAlAdeVviyu acacxrogoMDa tananx sArathige BaMDAsurana pUvaRvaqtAtxMtavanunx heVLidudu; deYtayxrAja deVviV ivarige GoVrayudadhx; daMDiniV deVviyu bAlAdeVviya asahAyashwyaRvanunx noVDi neravige baMdudu;

bAlAdeVviyanunx apAyashaMkeyiMda taDedu lalitA parameVshavxriV samiVpakekx karedukoMDuhoVgi vijAcnxpisiduda; mahArANiya aBinaMdane, saMpatakxriV, vishukarxrigU, ashAvxrUDhA, viSaMgarigU, daMDiniV BaMDAsurarigU yudadhxvAgi rAkAsxsaru soVtu himemxTiTxdudu; amaqteVshiyu maqtarAgidadx shakitx deVviyaranunx badukisidaLu; avaroDane baMdu daMDiniVdeVviyu I jayavanunx mahArANIge vijAcnxpisidaLu!

BaMDAsuranu tananx rAjadhAniyAda shUnayxkanagaravanunx paDedu, aMtaHpuradalilx moVhiniV muMtAda tananx patinxyadu lalitApaameVshavxriya mahimeyanunx nAradaniMda tiLidiralu, tananx saMhAravanUnx anivArayxveMdu tiLIsi, avaranunx samAdhAnapaDisi, saBege baralu, alilx seVnApatigaLu shaturxsaMhAravanunx parxtijecnxmADidudu; dumaRdanu yudadhxdalilx saMpatakxriVdeVviyiMda hatanAdudu;

dumaRdana aNaNxnAda kuraMDanu ashAvxrUDhAdeVviyiMda yudadhxdalilx saMhaqtanAdudu; seVnApatiyAda kuTilAkaSxniMda niyukatxrAda karaMkAdigaLu sapiRNiVmAyeyanunx parxyoVgisalu, shakitxgaLu parAButarAdudu; Aga deVviyu nakuliVsha shakitxyanunx kaLuhisalu, Akeyu sapaRgaLanUnx rAkaSxsatanUnx nAshamADidudu; karaMka muMtAdavara saMhAra;

rAtirxyudadhxvu pArxraMBavAgalu, jAvxlAmuKiVdeVviyiMda tamoVnAshana; bAlAMbAdeVviyu mUvatutx jana BaMDana makakxLanUnx mUCeRgoLisidudu; baMDana soVdaraLiyarAda uLukAdigaLu AshavxrUDhAsaMpanAnxthAdevviyariMda hatarAdudu; kuTilAkaSxnanunx daMDiniyu saMharisidaLu; vishukarxnu maMtirxNiyoDane yudadhxdalilx mUCiRtanAgalu avananunx BaMDana samiVpakekx sAgisidaru; viSaMganu moVsa yudadhxdiMda lalitApahArakekx baralu ececxtatx shakitxgaLu taDedu yudadhxmADidaru;

A rAtirxyalilx damanAdigaLanunx kAmeVshavxriyu nAsha mADidaLu; viSaMganu kalipxsida mAyApuruSananunx kAmeVshiyu vimAyAsatxrXdiMda nAshamADi, avananunx sharehiDidu lalitAsamiVpakekx sAgisidaLu; maMtirxNiV muMtAdavaru avananunx kolalxleLasalu lalitAparameVshavxriyu, badadhxnu maqtasamanu eMdu heVLi, biDisi, I vaqtAMtavanunx BaMDanige tiLisalu, kaLuhisidaLu; AmeVle shakitx seYnayxda AyAsaparihAra rakaSxNege jAvxlAmAliniyu jAvxleya koVTeyanunx kalipxsidudu;

parAjitanAda viSaMgavanunx avana aNaNxnAda vishukarxnu samAdhAnapaDisi, BAgaRvaniMda paDedidadx shaturxnAshaka yaMtarxvanunx koDalu, avanu adanunx shakitx seVneyalilx hAkidudu; A viGanxyaMtarxda parxBAvadiMda shakitxgaLu alasarAgiralu daMDiniyu idanunx lalitAdeVvige vijAcnxpisidudu!

lalitAparameVshavxriyu shakitxvishiSaTx viGenxVshavxrananunx tananx matutx kAmeVshavxrana muKasimxtadimda uMTumADi, A viGanxyaMtarxnAshakekx kaLuhisidudu; gaNeVshanu A yaMtarxvanunx nAshapaDisi vishukArxdigaLanunx hoDedu mUCeRgoLisidanu; edurisalu baMda A gaNeVshanoDane yudadhxmADalu BaMDanu gajAsurananunx saqjisi kaLUhisidudu; shakitxgaLelalxrU yudadhxdalilx toDagidaru; bAlAMbAdeVviyu obabxLeV BaMDaputrxranunx edurisidudu;

A gaJAsuranu saqjisida aneVka gajAsuraranunx gaNeVshanu saqjisida gaNesharu saMharisidudu; gaNeVshanu gajAsurananunx saMharisidudu; BaMDanu lalitAparameVshavxriyiMda saMhAravanunx bayasuvudanunx tiLidu, mahArANiyu gaNeVshananunx yudadhxdiMda vishArxMtananunx mADidudu; bAlAdeVviyu maMtirxNiV daMDiniV deVviyaranunx hiMdemADi, BaMDAsurana makakxLanunx obabxLeV yudadhxdalilx saMharisidudu;

bAlAdeVviyanunx mahArANiyu aBinaMdisidudu; BaMDAsuranu putarxshoVkada vAyxkulateyanunx savxlapx kAlavAda meVle viveVkadiMda sahisi lalitAdhAyxna maganxnAdudu; Aga viSaMga, vishukarxru samAdhAnapaDisidudu; BaMDAsuranu tananx haqdayadalilxna tirxpurArUpaLAda lalitAparameVshavxriyalilxruva Bakitxyanunx mucicx, deYtayxrAjanaMte vayxvarisutAtx makakxLa vadhegAgi duHKasidanu; viSaMganu cakarx rAjada dakiSxNapAshaCxRdalilxyU, vishukarxnu vAmapAshavxRdalilxyU, mutixdaru; daMDiniVdeVviyu sArathiyAda BeYravaniMda muMdugaDeyalUlx, savxpenxVshavxriV kAlasaMkaSiRniV shakitxdeVviyarimda hiMdugaDeyalUlx kUDi viSaMgananunx edurisadaLu; maMtirxNiVdeVviyu shukashAyxmalAdeVviV muMtAdavaroDane vishukarxnanunx edurisidaLu; shukashAyxmalA deVviyu jiVmUtakAyananUnx, sArikAshakitxyu deVvAriyanUnx, saMgiVtasjakitxdeVviyu karaMBananUnx, sAhitayxshAyxmalAdeVviyu shiKiBASaNananUnx, hiVge vishukarxna makakxLanunx saMharisidudu; aSaTxralilx mAyeyiMda baMda vishukarxnu laGushAyxmalA deVviyiMda hatanAgi mUCeRhoVgidudux ecacxtutx, maMtirxNiVdeVviyiMda hatanAdanu;

jaMBiniV, aMdhiniV, moVhiniV muMtAda shakitxdeVviyaru karALavakatxrX muMtAda shakitxdeVviyaru karALavakatxrX muMtAda viSaMgaputarxranunx saMharisidaru; daMDiniVdeVviyu viSaMgana mAyeyanunx nAshamADi, avananUnx saMharisidaLu;

soVdarara maraNadiMda duHKitanAda BaMDAsuranu lalitAdeVviyiMdaleV tanage maraNa LABavU, sherxVyaHpArxpitxyU, AguvudeMdu tiLidu, duHKavanunx dUramADikoMDanu; AmeVle vAyxvahArika daqSiTxyiMda deYtayxrAjanu deVviyoDane yudadhxkekx baMdanu; lalitAparameVshavxriyU maMtirxNiV, daMDiniV, nAlAMbA, ivaroDane muMduvaridu BaMDavanunx edurisidaLu; BaMDAsurana AnaMdavanunx gamanisi, avana sArathiyu adakekx kAraNavanunx keVLidanu; Aga BaMDasuranu lalitAparaMeVshavxriyu paratatavxsavxrUpaLeMbudanUnx, tananx pUvaRjanamxda katheyanUnx sArathige tiLiya heVLi, deVviyiMda tananx maraNavAguvudeMdu vivarisidanu;

BaMDAsuranu tananxnunx edurisida maMtiVNiV muMtAda shakitxdeVviyarige tananx yudadhxsAmathayxRkwshalagaLanunx toVrisi, tANu lalitAdeVviyoDane yudadhxmADabeVkeMba Aseyanunx tiLisidanu; avaru avananunx jayisuvudu lalitAparameVshavxriV deVvige mAtarx sAdhayxveMbudanUnx adara aucitarxvanUnx tiLidu, taTasadhxrAdaru; AmeVle BaMDAsuranu lalitAdeVviyanunx kaMDu, AnaMdaBakitxyutanAgi bANapuSapxgaLiMda deVviyanunx modalu pUjisidanu; anaMtaradalilx BaMDaniMda saqjisalapxTaTx madhukeYTaBa muMtAda viSuNxshaturxgaLanUnx, aMdhaka muMtAda shivashaturxgaLanUnx, yudadhxkekx baMdudanunx noVDida lalitA deVviyu viSuNxvina dashavatAragaLanUnx, shaMkarananUnx uMTumADi, avaranunx saMhAramADisidaLu; taruvAya BaMDAsurana mAyAyudadhxdiMda elalxrU kaMgeDalu, lalitAdeVviyu pAshupatAsatxrXdiMda itararelalxranUnx saMharisidaLu; tananx dhAyxnadalilx toDagidadx BaMDAsurananunx kAmeVshAsatxrXdiMda hoDedaLu; adu BaMDAsurananunx avana rAjadhAniyAda shUnayxkapura, heMDiti, makakxLoDane saMharisitu; barxhAmxdideVvategaLu baMdu AnaMdadiMda deVviyanunx gwravisidaru;

barxhmAxdi deVvategaLu mADida lalitAparameVshavxriV deVviya sutxti; anaMta barxhAmxMDagaLiMda aneVka barxhAmxdigaLu baMdu deVviyanunx pUjisidaru; vishavxkamaRnu barxhamxna apapxNeyaMte meVrushaqMgadalilx racisidadx shirxVpuradalilx nelesirutAtx Bakarxtanunx anugarxhisutitxrabeVkeMba deVvAdigaLa pArxthaRneyanunx deVviyu aMgiVkarisidaLu; baqhasapxti, barxhAmx, vasiSaThx muMtAda mahaniVyaru deVviyanunx alilx ratanxsiMhAsanadalilx paTATxBiSeVkadiMda pUjisidaru; iMtaha shirxVpuravanunx agasatxyXnu kANalAgadiralu kAraNavanunx keVLalu hayagirxVvanu tirxpurAdeVviya upAsaneyanunx guruviniMda diVkASxgarxhaNapurasasxravAgi mADadiruvudeV kAraNaveMdU tiLisidanu; sididhxya lABakekx mAhAtAmxyXsharxvaNaveV kAraNaveMdU vivarisidanu;

parashurAmana Bakitx, saMtoVSagaLiMda kUDi datAtxterxVya guruvanunx namasakxrisi, saMvataRvanunx guruBakitxvarxvataRkanAdudariMda manasisxnalilx sutxtisi, agasatxyXnu shirxVpurada dashaRnakekx anahaRnAgalu kAraNavanunx keVLalu, divxjatavxkekx upanayanavu heVgoV hAge, tirxpuroVpAsaneya sididhxge diVkASxgarxhaNavu AvashayxkaveMdu tiLisidanu; veYdika kamaRgaLU terxguNayx viSayagaLeMdU, bArxhamxNayxda hAge shirxVvidoyxVpAsaneyanunx diVkASxgarxhaNadiMda kApADikoMDirabeVkeMdU, elalxralUlx iruva ciCaCxkitxyeV tirxpurA parameVshavxriV eMdU, elalx vasutxvU cicapxkitxya satavxguNadiMdaleV uMTAgutatxdeMdU, veVdAga magaLa tAtapxrayxsAmarasayxvanunx tiLiya heVLidanu; agasatxyXna saMcitavAsanegaLiMda shirxVpuradashaRnadalilx aDiDxyAgitetxMdU, patinxyAda loVpAmudArx deVviyiMda diVkeSxyanunx paDedu sidadhxnAdaneMdU vivarisidanu; saMsakxta sAhitayxdalilx taMtarxshAsatxrX garxMthagaLa sAthxna, veVdAMtadashaRnadoDane taMtarxshAsatxrXgaLa sidAdhxMta sAmarasayx, upAsaneyu jAcnxna sAdhanavu, AcAra visheVSagaLa aucitayxnirUpaNegaLu;

jAgarxteyAgi PalavanunxMTumADuva tirxpuroVpAsana vidhAnavanunx parashurAmanu keVLalu, datatxguruvu tirxpurAmUtiRpUjA, utasxva, shirxVvidAyxmaMtarx, japa, dhAyxna, shirxVcakarxsAthxpana, dAna pUjAdi kamaRgaLanunx vivarisidanu; kaDeyalilx tirxpurAmAhAtamxyX sharxvaNavu elalxkUkx mUlavAda modala kAraNaveMdu heVLidudu; tirxpurAnAmoVlelxVKa maMgaLadiMda I garxMthavu mugidiruvudu;

s2.title: maMgaLAcaraNe—rAmAyaNavu nUru koVTi garxMthavuLaLxdudx BUloVkadalilx iruvudu ipapxtetxYdu sAvira garxMthagaLu. adaralilx rAmamahimeya viSaya. Iga siVteya mahimeyanunx heVLuvudu. A siVteyeV parxkaqtiyu, parAtapxra rUpaLu. rAmanu paramapuruSanu. rAma siVteyaru oMdeV eMba viSaya.

rAdhAmAdhavara rUpaguNagaLanunx vaNiRsi naMdiniyu munisanunx nivarisidudu; shirxVkaqSaNxdashaRnavanunx paDedu avaniMda tananx sitxrXVpUpanivAraNeyAgi nArada rUpavanunx kaqSANxnadiyalilx sAnxnamADi paDeyabahudeMdu tiLidu, hAge mADi baMdu shirxVkaqSaNxnanunx sutxtisidudu; bahumAnapArxpitx; paramAtamxnige saguNaniguRNa eMdu rUpadavxya; jagadavxyXvahArakAkxgi saguNarUpa, vAsatxvarUpavu niguRNavAdudu; shirxVkaqSaNxnu A paramAtamxna saguNarUpanu; parxsaMgadiMda kaliyugada doVSaparxBAvavaNaRne;

barxhamxnu kiSxVrasAgarada samiVpadalilx tapasusxmADi sutxtisalu, viSuNxvu adevxYtaparatatavxvanunx tiLiyaheVLidudalalxde, BUBAranivAraNegAgi deVvakiV vasudeVvariMda shirxVkaqSaNxnAgi avatarisuveneMdu heVLi samAdhAnapaDisidudu; shirxVkaqSaNxna janamx; vasudeVvana sotxVtarx; avana apapxNeyaMte naMdana gaqhadalilx kaqSaNxnanunx iTuTx alilx huTiTxdadx mAyAshakitxyanunx taMdudu;

naMdana maneyalilx veYBavadiMda putorxVtasxvavanunx neraveVrisidudu; dAna, pUje, Bajane, jAgaraNe; savxpanxdalilx vasudeVvanu BagavaMtaniMda sUrayxvaMshavanUnx, rAmanAgi huTiTx BUBAranivAraNe mADidudanUnx keVLidudu; rAmakathAsaMgarxhavaNaRne;

itatxlAgi kaMsanu savxpanxdalilx yamabAlakananunx noVDi avaniMda goVkuladalilxruva bAlakana hanonxMdaneya vayasisxnalilx tananx maraNaveMdu keVLi, avana saMhArakAkxgi pUtaniyanunx kaLuhisidudu; shirxVkaqSaNxnu avaLanunx saMharisidudu; avaLige sadagxti pArxpitxyAdudu; adu heVgeMdu keVLalu hiMdina katheya vivaraNe;

kakiSxVvaMtaneMba QuSiyu saMtAnAthaRvAgi tapasisxge hoVgiralu, avana heMDiti cArumatiyu shUdArxkaqSaNxLAgidudxdanunx hiMtirugi baMda gaMDanu tiLidu, rAkaSxsiyAgeMdu shapisalu avaLu pUtaniyAdudu; cayxvanana tapoVBaMgavanunx mADida rAkaSxsaranunx A QuSiya meYyiMduMTAda deVvategaLu saMharisidudu; avana apapxNeyaMte avaru rudarxnalilxge hoVdAga avanu dhAyxnAsakatxnAgiralu, pArathxtiyiMda moVhagoMDu, pashAcxtatxpatxrAgi, bahirumxKanAda shivana budidhxvAdadaMte kaqshAnuputarxrAgi goVkuladalilx janisi, pUtanA viSasatxnayxvanunx modalu pAna mADi, kaqSaNxnu pAnamADidameVle shudadhxrAgi mukatxrAdudu; pUtanAsaMhAravAdAga naMdanu BoVjarAjanige kapapxvanunx koDalu A paTaTxNakekx hoVgidudxdu; naMda vasudeVvara meYtirxV salAlxpa samAdhAnagaLu; itatxlAgi pUtaniya sahoVdariyu kaMsananunx dUSisidudu; kaMsanu taqNAvaratx, AGAsura, bakAsuraranunx kaLuhisalu nishacxyisidudu;

BUBAravanunx nivArisalu kaqSANxvatAravAgiruvudanunx tiLidu mahAdeVvanU, barxhamxnU, baMdunoVDi yashoVdA, naMda muMtAdavara BAgayxvanunx shAlxGisidudu; kaMsanu kaLuhisidadx shakaTAsuranu kaqSaNxna odetadiMda satutxdu; I kaqSaNxna bAlayxcaritarxvanunx keVLalu pArxthiRsida nAradanige shirxVkaqSaNxneV heVLidudu; atatxlAgi kaMsana aGAsura bakAsura taqNAvataRroDane samAloVcane.

pUtaniya gaMDa GaToVdarananUnx, avaLa cikakxpapxna makakxLAda aGAsura bakAsuraranUnx, niraparAdhi parxjAnAshaBayadiMda hedarida kaMsanu taDedu,kaqSaNxnanunx mAtarx hArisikoMDu taralu taqNAvataRnanunx birugALiya rUpadalilx kaLuhisidudu; taqNAvataRnanunx shirxVkaqSaNxnu katutxhiDidu hisuki koMdudu; goVparu naMdananunx aBinaMdisidudu; taqNAvataRnu shirxVkaqSaNx sapxshaRvanunx paDedudariMda avana joyxVtiyu shirxVkaqSaNxnalilx seVridudu; avana pUvaRjanamx kathe; dArxviDadeVshadalilx vishavxratha rAjanAgidudxdu; tiLiyade hariBakatxnAdavananunx kaLaLxneMdu sere hAkidudxdu; A rAjaneV taqNAvataRnAgidudx Iga sadagxtiyanunx paDedudu;

kaMsanu taqNAvataRna saMhArada vivaravanunx dUtariMda keVLi, puruSayatanxkikxMta deYvapArxbalayxvu migileMdu tiLidu, ciMtAkArxMtanAgiruvAga savxpanxdalilx deVvakiya eMTaneya maguvanUnx kolalxhoVdAga Adishakitx athavA mahAmAyArUpiNiyAda A shishvu hAgi tapipxsikoMDu, kaMsana shaturxvu goVkuladalilx beLeyutitxruvudAgi heVLi hoVdameVle, pashAcxtatxpatxnAda kaMsanu vasudeVva deVvakiyaralilx kaSxmA pArxthaRneyanunx mADalu, avaru avananunx samAdhAnapaDisidudu, idelalxvanUnx kaMDanu. kaMsanu hiVge AgAgegx puruSakArakikxMta deYva pArxbalayxvu migilAdudeMbudanunx managaMDarU, punaH rAjayxloVBadiMda shaturxnAshakAkxgi aGAsurananUnx bakAsurananUnx kaLuhisidanu; itatxlAgi naMdana maneyalilx shirxVkaqSaNxna bAlaliVleya vaNaRne; oMdu dina vasudeVvanu gagaRmahaSiRyanunx kaMDu shirxVkaqSaNx balarAmarige nAmakaraNavanunx guTATxgi mADalu kaLuhisidanu; gagaRnu naMnaniMda gwravisalapxTuTx, A bAlakarige nAmakaraNa saMsAkxra mahoVtasxvavanunx guTATxgi neraveVrisilu avananunx opipxsidudu;

nAmakaraNa saMsAkxravanunx hAge neraveVrisida meVle, gagaRnu rAmakaqSaNxra BaviSayxvanunx avara jAtaka yoVgadiMda tiLidu yashoVdhA naMdarige vivarisidudu; shirxVkaqSaNxnu mahAviSuNxvina avatAraveMbudanUnx tiLisi, dhamARcaraNeya budidhxvAdavanUnx heVLi hiMtirugidudu; muMdina kaqSaNxliVleyanUnx shirxVkaqSaNxneV nAradanige vivarisuvudanunx muMduvariyisidudu; bAlakaqSaNxnu goVpiyara manegaLalilx hAlu mosaru tupapxgaLanunx kuDidu, tiMdu calilx, senxVhitarigU kapigaLigU koDuvudu; avugaLa pAterxgaLanunx oDeyuvudu; goVpiyaranunx nayaBaya vaMcanegaLiMda beragugoLisudu; avaru yashoVdeyalilx baMdu dUridare, samayakekx takakxMte mAtanAnxDi elalxranUnx maruLugoLisuvudu; yashoVdeyu avarannx sAmavAkayxgaLiMda samAdhAnagoLisuvudu; goVpiyarelalxrigU aparAdhakikxMta hecAcxgi AnaMdavanunxMTumADuvudu;

goVpiyaru dUruvudanunx keVLi yashoVdegU kaDege saMshayavuMTAyitu; goVpiyaru oTATxgi kaqSaNxnanunx hiDiyalu avanu tuMTatanadiMda tapipxsikoMDudu; hAlu mosaru beNeNxgaLanunx tAvAgiyeV koTuTx upacarisida goVpiyaranunx anugarxhisidudu;
goVpasitxrXVyaru kaqSaNxnanunx hiDidu shikiSxsalu parxyatanx paTaTxre avanu avaranunx hosahosa yukitx, camatAkxra, aduBxtagaLiMda moVhagoLisuvudu;
goVpiyara dUranunx keVLi yashoVdeyu kaqSaNxnige budidhxvAdavanunx heVLalu, avana samAdhAnoVkitxyu; kaqSaNxnU parxtiyAgi goVpiyaranunx dUruvudu; yashoVdeyu samAdhAnapaDisuvudu;

yashoVdeyeV oMdu dina deVvara pUjegeMdu sidadhxtegaLanunx mADi goVpiyaranUnx kareyahoVdAga, kaqSaNxnu avanUnx tiMdu kuDidu senxVhitarigU, kaqSaNxnu avanUnx tiMdu kuDidu senxVhitarigU, kapigaLigU koTuTx tapipxsikoMDuhoVdudu; anayx deVvatABakatxralilx kaqSaNxnu mADutitxdadx tuMTatanada gUDhABipArxyada vivaraNe; tAyiyanunx kuritu kaqSaNxnu samayabaMdAga tananx aishavxrayxmahimegaLanunx toVrisuveneMdudu;

omemx nAradaru iMdarxna parxshenxge utatxrisutatx gwrama muniya mahimeyanunx tiLisidudx. gwramara Asharxmada vaNaRne. gwtama muniya sUkaSxmX paricaya. gwtamaru Asharxmakekx hiMdiruguda meVle Enu naDeyitu? eMba rukAmxMgadana paqceCxge nAradaru katheyanunx muMduvarisidudx. gwtamara Asharxmakekx baMdu `pAdoVdakavanunx koDu' eMdu tamamx heMDatiyanunx perxVrisidAgUyx avamAnaduHKitaLAda ahaleyxyu bAradiralu `iMdeVke? dinadaMte ilalx' eMdu punaH heMDatiyanunx kareyalu naDugutatx horakekx baMda ahaleyxyu modalu gaMDananunx namasakxrisi naDeda saMgatiyanenxlalx vAsatxva riVtiyalilx patige tiLisidudu. koVpAMdhanAda gwtamanu ahaleyxyanunx `kalAlxgi hoVgu' eMdu shapisidudu. `aparAdhi yAru'? eMbudanunx dhAyxnisi noVDi avaLige upashApavaninxtutxdu ahaleyxyu kalAlxgi hoVda sudidhxyu iMdarxnige muTaTxlu avanu naDugi munige goVcaranAgadaMte bekAkxgi saMcarisalAraMBisidudu. idanunx dhAyxnayoVgadiMda gwtamaru tiLidu `sahasarxBaganAgu' eMdu iMdarxnanunx shapisidudu. deVveVMdarxna parxlApa vaNaRne miNuku huLuvina rUpavanunx dharisi iMdarxnu kamalada nALadalilx aDagidudx.

I shApavimoVcaneyu gwtamara anugarxhadiMdaleV AgabeVkeMdu nishacxyisi nAradaranunx muMdiTuTxkoMDu deVvategaLu muniya Asharxmakekx baMdudu. avarige pUjAdigaLanunx salilxsida naMtara muniyanunx sutxtisidudu. vAlaKilayxra paricaya. gwtamaru deVvategaLa vacanagaLige gwravavaninxtutx avara aBiVSaTxvanunx neraveVrisuveneMdu aBayavitutxdu. idariMda haqSaTxrAda divwkasaru iMdarxnige shApamoVkaSxvananxnugarxhisabeVkeMdu koVridudu. iMdarxna viSayadalilx bahaLa mAtasxyaRgarxsatxnAdarU QuSiyu koTaTx vacanakekx tapapxliSaTxpaDadeyeV mahA gaNapatiya SaDakaSxrada maMtorxVpAsaneyanunx iMdarxnu mADidAdxdare shApa mukatxnAguvaneMdu heVLi, maMTarxvanUnx deVvananUnx hogaLidudu. haSoRVnanxtatxrAda divijaru muniyanunx pUjisi avananunx hogaLutatx parxyANa mADidudu.

iMdarxnu aDagidedxDege deVvategaLu hoVgi tAvu QuSiyanunx baMdudu. avarelalxroDane rukAmxMgadanu vimAnA samAdhAnapaDisi avanigAgi upashApavanunx paDeda saMgatiyanunx tiLisi, dheYyaRvAgi horakekx baruvaMte perxVrisidudu. aparAdhavesaguvudakikxMtalU adanunx goVpana mADuvudu parama pAtakaveMbudanunx soVdAharaNa vAgi tiLisi avananunx samAdhAnapaDisidudu. iMdarxna AviBARva shApagarxsatxvAda deVhada vaNaRne. SaDakaSxra maMtorxVpadeVsha. oDaneyeV modalinaMte deVhada mApARDu. saMtuSaTxrAda deVvategaLu deVveVMdarxnanunx hogaLidudu. tAnu deVvategaLa karuNeyiMda shApavimukatxnAda saMgatiyanunx matetx matetx heVLutatx avaranunx aBinaMdisi shApavimoVkakekx parxyatinxsida bageyanunx vicArisidudu. deVvategaLu elalxvanUnx vivarisalu deVvananunx parxtayxkaSxgoLisikoLaLxda horatu tAnu suraloVkakekx baralAreneMdu heVLidudu.

iMdarxna tapoVvaNaRne. parxsananxnAda mahAgaNapatiya divayx rUpada vaNaRne, deVvaneMdu tiLiyalAradeV BayadiMda toLalutitxruva iMdarxnanunx gaNapatiyu sAMtavanagoLisidudu. tananx sAkAra—nirAkAra rUpagaLanunx tAneV baNiNxsidudu. iMdarxnu vinAyakananunx gurutisi bahaLa BakitxyiMda deVvanige namasakxrisi pArxthiRsidudu. deVana vaNaRne matutx deVvanalilx BakitxdaqDhavAgabeVkeMdU, tAnu tapavanAnxcarisida sathxLavu paramapavitarxvUjAgaqtiyuLuLxdU AgabeVkeMdU varavanunx beVDidudu. deVveVshanu savaRpArxthaRnegaLanUnx anugarxhisidudu. matutx ciMtitAthaRgaLanunx koDatakakxvanAgi ciMtAmaNi eMba hesariniMda tAnu alelxV nelesuvudAgi matotxMdu varavanunx koTuTxdu—amara gaMgAjaladiMda deVvaranunx iMdarxnu sAkASxtAtxgi aBiSeVkisi pUjisidanaMtara doDaDxdoMdu ratanx KacitavAda maMdiravanunx nimiRsi, alolxMdu saPxTikamUtiRyanunx parxtiSiThxsidudu. tAnu parxtiSiThxsida mUtiRge manadaNiyuvaMte pUjesalilxsi, alilxdadx saroVvaravanunx ciMtAmaNisarasesxMdu karedudu iMtaha mahimeyuLaLx A tiVthaRdalilx niVnu miMdu shApamukatxnAgeMdu nAradaru rukAmxMgada mahArAjanige perxVrisidu matutx rAjanige aneVka shuBakarAshiVvaRcanagaLaninxtutx avana anumatiyaMte tAvu saMcAra horaTudu.

nAradaru horaTu hoVda meVle rukAmxMgadanu Enanunx mADidanu? adanunx tiLisabeVkeMdu vAyxsaru barxhamxdeVvananunx parxshinxsidudu. rAjanigU avana seVnegU parasapxra BeVTiyAguvike rAjana duravasethxgAgi seVvaka parihAradavara paritApa. rAjanu aduvarege naDeda saMgatiyanenxlalx heVLidudu. rAjanu saparivAranAgi gaNeVsha tiVthaRkekx baMdu, alilx aneVka dAnagaLanunx koTuTxdu. rAjanu shApamukatxnAdudu. vinAyakana gaNadavaru rAjananunx karedoyayxlu vimAnArUDharAgi baMdudu. rAjana Bakitxyanunx vaNiRsida deVvaseVvakaru tAvu baMda udedxVshavanunx aruhidudu. deVvana savxrUpa vaNaRne. rAjanu tananx mAtApitaqgaLanunx biTuTx tAnu mAtarx baralArenenalu, avarigAgi tiVthaRdalilx punaHsAnxnamADi puNayxvanunx dhAre ere enalu, adaraMte rAjanu mADidudu. dhAreereva karxmada nirUpaNe. ideV saMdaBaRdalilx rAjanu tananx nAgarikarigAgiyU sAnxnada puNayxvanunx dhAre eredudu. rAjanu vimAnavanenxVri kwMDinayxpurakekx rUDhanAgi deVvasAninxdhayxvanunx paDedudu. Palashurxti.

vAyxsaru barxhamxnanunx sutxtisutatx mukuMdeya cariterxyanunx muMduvarisi heVLabeVkeMdu parxshinxsidudu. rukAmxMgadaniMda tirasakxqqtaLAda meVle mukuMdeyu kAmana kATavanunx tALalAradeV hucicxyaMte aleyutatx oMdeDe mUCiRtaLAgi bidudxdu. idanunx tiLida deVveVMdarxnu rAjana veVSadiMDa avaLa baLige baMdu, avaLanunx ramisidudu. tanUmxlaka gaBaRvatiyAda mukuMdeyu 9neya tiMgaLalilx oMdu puMparxjeyanunx parxsavisidudu saraLa savxBAvada vAcakrxvijayu janisida shishuvanunx tananx sutaneMdu tiLidu tAtAkxlika shuBa kamaRgaLanenxlalx Acarisi `gaqtasxmada' eMdu hesariTuTxdu. Atanige upanayanAdi saMsAkxragaLanunx naDesi gaNapatiya maMtarxvanunx upadeVshisidudu. veVdavarxtagaLa savxrUpa magadha rAjana manege oMdu dina peYtaqkakAyaRkAkxgi itara munigaLoDane gaqtasxmadanU baMdu seVridudu. shAsatxrX viSayakavAda ceceR naDeda saMdaBaRdalilx koVpagoMDa atirxgaLu `kaSxtirxya putarx'neMdu gaqtasxmadananunx dhikakxrisidudu. parxtiloVma shabadxnivaRcane. KinanxmanasakxnAda gaqtasxmadanu aleyutitxruvAga puSapxkavanavanunx kaMDudu. vanada vaNaRne. alilxdadx QuSigaLa anumatiyiMda tAnU alelxV tapasisxge kuLitudu. avana tapoVniSeThxya vaNaRne. tananx tapoVjAvxleyiMda sumanasaranenxlalx tapisidudu. mahAgaNeVshanu pArxduBaRvisidudu. deVvadeVvana rUpada vaNaRne. gaqtasxmadana muMdina katheyanunx heVLabeVkeMdu vAyxsaru parxshenxsidadxkekx barxhamxnu muMduvarisidudx. gaqtasxmadanige deYvAnugarxha dorakidudariMda elalxrU avananunx mAnisatoDagidudu. oMdu dina gaqtasxmadanige balavAgi oMdu siVnu baMdu, tanUmxlaka obabx bAlakanu utapxnanxnAdudu.
